(fn roman [arabic]
  (letfn [(recurse [r a] (str r (roman (- arabic a))))]
    (cond (>= arabic 1000) (recurse "M" 1000)
          (>= arabic 900) (recurse "CM" 900)
          (>= arabic 500) (recurse "D" 500)
          (>= arabic 100) (recurse "C" 100)
          (>= arabic 90) (recurse "XC" 90)
          (>= arabic 40) (recurse "XL" 40)
          (>= arabic 10) (recurse "X" 10)
          (>= arabic 9) (recurse "IX" 9)
          (>= arabic 5) (recurse "V" 5)
          (>= arabic 4) (recurse "IV" 4)
          (>= arabic 1) (recurse "I"  1))))

(fn __ [roman]
  (let [table 
         {1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 
    	  100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 
  		  10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I" 0 ""}]
    (loop [cur roman final "" numerator 0]
      (if (= 0 cur)
          final
          (recur 
           (- cur numerator) 
           (str final (table numerator))
           (apply (partial max-key identity) 
                 (filter (partial >= (- cur numerator)) (keys table))))))))

(fn [n]
    (loop [n n
           roman '()]
      (cond
       (>= n 1000) (recur (- n 1000) (conj roman \M))
       (>= n 900) (recur (- n 900) (concat '(\M \C) roman))
       (>= n 500) (recur (- n 500) (conj roman \D))
       (>= n 400) (recur (- n 400) (concat '(\D \C) roman))
       (>= n 100) (recur (- n 100) (conj roman \C))
       (>= n 90) (recur (- n 90) (concat '(\C \X) roman))
       (>= n 50) (recur (- n 50) (conj roman \L))
       (>= n 40) (recur (- n 40) (concat '(\L \X) roman))
       (>= n 10) (recur (- n 10) (conj roman \X))
       (>= n 9) (recur (- n 9) (concat '(\X \I) roman))
       (>= n 5) (recur (- n 5) (conj roman \V))
       (>= n 4) (recur (- n 4) (concat '(\V \I) roman))
       (>= n 1) (recur (- n 1) (conj roman \I))
       (= n 0) (apply str (reverse roman)))))

(fn to-roman [n]
  (letfn [(repeat-str [s n] (apply str (repeat n s)))]
    (let [coins
          '((1000 "M") (900 "CM") (500 "D") (400 "CD") (100 "C") (90 "XC") (50 "L") (40 "XL") (10 "X") (9 "IX") (5 "V") (4 "IV") (1 "I"))]
      (second
       (reduce
        (fn [[num current-str] [value code]]
          (let [repetitions (quot num value)]
            [(- num (* repetitions value)) (str current-str (repeat-str code repetitions))]))
        [n ""] coins)))))

(fn k[n]
   (let [rep (fn[s n] (clojure.string/join(repeat n s)))]
     (loop [n n
            out ""]
       (cond

         (>  (quot n 1000) 0) (recur (rem n 1000)(str out (rep "M" (quot n 1000)) ))
         (>  (quot n 100) 0) (recur (rem n 100)(str out (case (quot n 100)
                                                         1 "C"
                                                         2  "CC"
                                                         3 "CCC"
                                                         4 "CD"
                                                         5 "D"
                                                         6 "DC"
                                                         7 "DCC"
                                                         8 "DCCC"
                                                         9 "CM") ))
         (>  (quot n 10) 0) (recur (rem n 10 )(str out (case (quot n 10)
                                                         1 "X"
                                                         2  "XX"
                                                         3 "XXX"
                                                         4 "XL"
                                                         5 "L"
                                                         6 "LX"
                                                         7 "LXX"
                                                         8 "LXXX"
                                                         9 "XC") ))
         (< n 10) (str out (case n
                             0 ""
                             1 "I"
                             2 "II"
                             3 "III"
                             4 "IV"
                             5 "V"
                             6 "VI"
                             7 "VII"
                             8 "VIII"
                             9 "IX"))
         ))))

(fn [s]
  (let [digits (map #(- (int %) 48) (str s))
        digits-indexed (clojure.core/reverse (map list (clojure.core/reverse digits) (range)))
        parts (filter #(< 0 %) (map #(* (first %) (int (Math/pow 10 (second %)))) digits-indexed))
        tr (fn g [n]
   (let [ml '([\I 1] [\V 5] [\X 10] [\L 50] [\C 100] [\D 500] [\M 1000])
         numbs (map second ml)
         m (apply hash-map (apply concat ml))
         mi (clojure.set/map-invert m)
         st (last (take-while #(<= % n) numbs))
         minuend (some #(if (< n %) %) numbs)
         subtrs [1000 100 10 1]
         subtr (some #(if (= minuend (+ n %)) %) subtrs)]
     (cond  (not= nil subtr)
            (str (mi subtr) (mi minuend))
            (some #(= % n) numbs)
            (apply str (repeat (quot n st) (mi st)))
            true
            (str (mi st) (g (- n st))))))]
    (apply str (map tr parts))))

(fn f [n]
   (let [triads [[\X \V \I]
                 [\C \L \X]
                 [\M \D \C]
                 [\- \- \M]]
         to-digits (fn [n]
                     (loop [n n
                            res []]
                       (if (zero? n) res
                           (recur (quot n 10) (conj res (mod n 10))))))
         rm-to-al (fn [d triad]
                    (let [[x v i] triad]
                      (apply str
                             (nth [[]
                                   [i]
                                   [i i]
                                   [i i i]
                                   [i v]
                                   [v]
                                   [v i]
                                   [v i i]
                                   [v i i i]
                                   [i x]] d))))]
     (apply str (reverse (map rm-to-al (to-digits n) triads)))))

(fn [n]
    (let [numeral-and-pair-values [1000 900 500 400 100 90 50 40 10 9 5 4 1]
          numeral-and-pairs ["M" "CM" "D" "CD" "C" "XC" "L" "XL" "X" "IX" "V" "IV" "I"]]
        (loop [n n, i 0, digits []]
            (if (zero? n)
                (apply str digits)
                (let [times (quot n (numeral-and-pair-values i))
                      sub (* times (numeral-and-pair-values i))]
                    (recur (- n sub) (inc i) (into digits (repeat times (numeral-and-pairs i))))
                )))))

(fn int->roman
  [n]
  (let [digit-seq
        (reverse (map (fn [x] (Integer/parseInt (str x))) (str n)))

        count-digits
        (count digit-seq)

        roman-map
        {:single    {:a "I"
                     :b "V"
                     :c "X"}
         :tenth     {:a "X"
                     :b "L"
                     :c "C"}
         :hundreds  {:a "C"
                     :b "D"
                     :c "M"}
         :thousands {:a "M"}}
        
        what-pattern
        (fn what-pattern
          [n group]
          (cond
            (= n 0) ""
            (< n 4) (apply str(repeat n (:a (group roman-map))))
            (= 4 n) (str (:a (group roman-map)) (:b (group roman-map)))
            (= 5 n) (:b (group roman-map))
            (= 6 n) (str (:b (group roman-map)) (:a (group roman-map)))
            (< n 9) (str (:b (group roman-map)) (apply str(repeat (- n 5) (:a (group roman-map)))))
            (= 9 n) (str (:a (group roman-map)) (:c (group roman-map)))))]
    (str
     (if (<= 4 count-digits)
       (str (what-pattern (nth digit-seq 3) :thousands))
       "") 
     (if (<= 3 count-digits)
       (str (what-pattern (nth digit-seq 2) :hundreds))
       "")
     (if (<= 2 count-digits)
       (str (what-pattern (nth digit-seq 1) :tenth))
       "")
     (if (<= 1 count-digits)
       (str (what-pattern (nth digit-seq 0) :single))
       ""))

    ))

(fn
  [n]
  (let [rm '(("" "M" "MM" "MMM")
             ("" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM")
             ("" "X" "XX"  "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC")
             ("" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"))]
    (reduce str (reverse
                 (map #(nth (nth rm %2) %)
                      (seq (map #(- (int %) 48) (reverse (str n))))
                      [3 2 1 0])))))

(fn [n]
  (let [vals [1000 900 500 400 100 90 50 40 10 9 5 4 1]
        nums ["M" "CM" "D" "CD" "C" "XC" "L" "XL" "X" "IX" "V" "IV" "I"]
        RN (zipmap vals nums)]
    (first (reduce
            (fn [[s x] v]
              (let [q (quot x v)]
                (if (> q 0)
                  [(str s (apply str (repeat q (get RN v))))
                   (- x (* q v))]
                  [s x])))
            ["" n] vals))))

(fn [x]
  (let [thousands ["" "M" "MM" "MMM" "MMMM" "MMMMM" "MMMMMM" "MMMMMMM" "MMMMMMMM" "MMMMMMMMM"]
        hundreds ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]
        tens ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]
        ones ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]]
    (str (thousands (quot x 1000))
         (hundreds (quot (mod x 1000) 100))
         (tens (quot (mod (mod x 1000) 100) 10))
         (ones (mod (mod (mod x 1000) 100) 10)))))

(fn [n]
  (let [R {1000 "M"  900 "CM" 500 "D" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL"
                 10 "X"  9 "IX" 8 "VIII" 7 "VII"
                 6 "VI" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 3 "III" 2 "II" 1 "I"}]
    (letfn [(next [n]
              (first (filter #(>= n %) (sort > (keys R)))))
            (rom [n result]
              (if (= 0 n)
                result
                (let [r (next n)]
                  (rom (- n r) (conj result (R r))))))]
      (apply str (rom n [])))))

(fn [n]
   (->> n
        str
        reverse
        (map-indexed
          (fn [magnitude x-char]
            (let [lookup {0 {1 "I"
                             5 "V"}
                          1 {1 "X"
                             5 "L"}
                          2 {1 "C"
                             5 "D"}
                          3 {1 "M"}}
                  numerals (lookup magnitude)
                  digit (Character/getNumericValue x-char)]
              (cond
                (= digit 9) (str (numerals 1) ((lookup (inc magnitude)) 1))
                (= digit 4) (str (numerals 1) (numerals 5))
                (= digit 0) ""
                :default (apply str (when (< 5 digit) (numerals 5)) (repeat (mod digit 5) (numerals 1)))))))
        reverse
        (apply str)))

(fn wnum [n]
  (let [r (sorted-map-by > 1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C"
                      90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I")       
        m (some #(when (>= (- n %) 0) %) (keys r))]
  (when-not (nil? m)
      (str (r m) (wnum (- n m))))))

(fn roman [n]
  (let [r (fn [n u h f]
            (apply str (cond 
                      (< n 4) (repeat n u)
                      (= n 4) (list u h)
                      (= n 9) (list u f)
                      :else
                      (cons h (repeat (- n 5) u)))))]
        (apply str (r (mod (quot n 1000) 10) "M" "?" "!")
                (r (mod (quot n 100) 10) "C" "D" "M")
                (r (mod (quot n 10) 10) "X" "L" "C")
                (r (mod n 10) "I" "V" "X"))))

(fn[n]
        (loop [drum [["M" 1000]["CM" 900]["D" 500]["CD" 400]["C" 100]["XC" 90]
                     ["L" 50]["XL" 40] ["X" 10]["IX" 9]["V" 5]["IV" 4] ["I" 1]]
               in  n
               out []]
          
          (let [head (first drum)
                lit (first head)
                val (second head)]

            (cond
             (zero? in)
             (apply str (interpose "" out))
                    
             :else
             (if (<= val in)
               (recur drum (- in val) (conj out lit))
               (recur (rest drum) in out))))))

(fn write-roman-numerals [num] (let [digits (fn digits [num ] 
																							      (let [r (quot num 10)]
																															(if(= 0 r)
																															  [num]
																															  (conj (digits r) (mod num 10) ))))
                                       symb [\I \V \X \L \C \D \M]
                                       digit-to-string (fn [[low middle high] num]
                                                         (cond 
																		                         (= 1 num) (str low)
									                                           (= 2 num) (str low low )
									                                           (= 3 num) (str low low low)
									                                           (= 4 num) (str low middle)
									                                           (= 5 num) (str middle)
									                                           (= 6 num) (str middle low)
									                                           (= 7 num) (str middle low low)
									                                           (= 8 num) (str middle low low low)
									                                           (= 9 num) (str low high)
																		                         :else "")
																		                       )
                                       reduce-func (fn [xs x] (let [pos (:pos xs)
                                                                    value (:value xs)]
                                                                { :value (conj (:value xs) (digit-to-string (take 3 (drop (* 2 pos) symb)) x))
                                                                 :pos (dec  pos)}))]
                                   (apply str (:value (reduce reduce-func {:value [] :pos (dec (count (digits num)))} (digits num))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [arabic-numbers {1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I"}]
    (loop [rslt "" curr-n n values (sort > (keys arabic-numbers))]
      (if (= curr-n 0)
        rslt
        (recur (str rslt
                    (apply str (repeat (quot curr-n (first values))
                               (arabic-numbers (first values)))))
               (- curr-n (* (quot curr-n (first values)) (first values)))
               (rest values))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [r (sorted-map 1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD"
                      100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X"
                      9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I")]
    (last (reduce #(let [n (first %), s (last %),
                         k (key %2), v (val %2)]
                     (loop [n n, s s]
                       (if (>= n k)
                         (recur (- n k) (str s v))
                         [n s])))         
                  [n ""]
                  (rseq r)))))

(fn roman [n]
  (loop [n n
         s ""
         l [[1000 "M"]
            [900  "CM"]
            [500  "D"]
            [400  "CD"]
            [100  "C"]
            [90   "XC"]
            [50   "L"]
            [40   "XL"]
            [10   "X"]
            [9    "IX"]
            [5    "V"]
            [4    "IV"]
            [1    "I"]]]
    (if l
      (let [[k v] (first l)]
        (if (>= n k)
          (recur (- n k) (str s v) l)
          (recur n s (next l))))
      s)))

(fn romanize
  ([int] (romanize int '()))
  ([int out]
     (if (zero? int)
       (apply str (reverse out))
       (let [numerals {
                       1 \I
                       4 "IV"
                       5 \V
                       9 "IX"
                       10 \X
                       40 "XL"
                       50 \L
                       90 "XC"
                       100 \C
                       400 "CD"
                       500 \D
                       900 "CM"
                       1000 \M
                       }
             smaller-numerals (filter (partial >= int) (keys numerals))
             largest (apply max smaller-numerals)]
         (recur (- int largest) (conj out (numerals largest)))))))

(fn
  [n]
  (let [m (array-map
         1 "I"
         4 "IV"
         5 "V"
         9 "IX"
         10 "X"
         50 "L"
         40 "XL"
         100 "C"
         90 "XC"
         500 "D"
         900 "CM"
         1000 "M")
        ns (map #(let [v (rem (quot n %) 10)]
                   (cond
                    (= % 1000) (repeat v "M")
                    (= % 100) (or (m (* v 100))
                                  (if (> v 5)
                                    (cons "D" (repeat (- v 5) "C"))
                                    (repeat v "C")))
                    (= % 10) (or (m (* v 10))
                                (if (> v 5)
                                  (cons "L" (repeat (- v 5) "X"))
                                  (repeat v "X")))
                    (= % 1) (or (m v)
                               (if (> v 5)
                                 (cons "V" (repeat (- v 5) "I"))
                                 (repeat v "I")))))
                [1000 100 10 1])
        ]
    (reduce str (flatten ns))))

(fn [n]
  (let [
    trans (fn [s f t]
      (let [m (into {} (map vector f t))]
        (map #(apply str (replace m %)) s)))

    digits ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]

    units #(nth digits %)
    tens #(nth (trans digits "IVX" "XLC") %)
    hundreds #(nth (trans digits "IVX" "CDM") %)
    thousands #(apply str (repeat % \M))]

      (let [digits (reverse (map (comp read-string str) (str n)))]
        (apply str    
          (reverse 
            (map #(%1 %2) [units tens hundreds thousands] digits))))))

(fn to-romans [n]
  (->>
   ((fn [n ds]
             (if (zero? n)
               ds
               (let [roman-digits { 1 "I", 4 "IV", 5 "V", 9 "IX", 10 "X", 40 "XL", 50 "L", 90 "XC", 100 "C", 500 "D", 900 "CM" 1000 "M"}
                     digits-sorted (->> roman-digits keys sort reverse)
                     next-digit (first (filter #(>= n %) digits-sorted))]
                 (recur (- n next-digit) (cons (->> next-digit roman-digits) ds))))) n '())
   (reverse)
   (apply str)))

(fn [n]
  (let [dec->roman (sorted-map-by > 1 "I" 4 "IV" 5 "V" 9 "IX" 10 "X"
                                  40 "XL" 50 "L" 90 "XC" 100 "C" 400
                                  "CD" 500 "D" 900 "CM" 1000 "M")]
    (loop [nums [] rem n]
      (if (zero? rem)
        (apply str (map dec->roman nums))
        (let [u (ffirst (subseq dec->roman >= rem))]
          (recur (conj nums u) (- rem u)))))))

(fn gen-roman [n]
    (apply str
           (second
            (reduce
             (fn [[total v] [t-str t-val]]
               (let [append-n (quot total t-val)]
                 [(- total
                     (* append-n t-val))
                  (into v
                        (repeat append-n t-str))]))
             [n []]
             (sort-by second > {"I" 1
                                "IV" 4
                                "V" 5
                                "IX" 9
                                "X" 10
                                "XL" 40
                                "L" 50
                                "XC" 90
                                "C" 100
                                "CD" 400
                                "D" 500
                                "CM" 900
                                "M" 1000})))))

(fn [n]
        (let [cs (loop [ret [] n n]
                (cond (>= n 1000) (recur (conj ret "M")  (- n 1000))
                      (>= n  900) (recur (conj ret "CM") (- n  900))
                      (>= n  500) (recur (conj ret "D")  (- n  500))
                      (>= n  100) (recur (conj ret "C")  (- n  100))
                      (>= n   90) (recur (conj ret "XC") (- n   90))
                      (>= n   40) (recur (conj ret "XL") (- n   40))
                      (>= n   10) (recur (conj ret "X")  (- n   10))
                      (>= n    9) (recur (conj ret "IX") (- n    9))
                      (>= n    5) (recur (conj ret "V")  (- n    5))
                      (>= n    4) (recur (conj ret "IV") (- n    4))
                      (>= n    1) (recur (conj ret "I")  (- n    1))
                      :else ret))]
                (apply str cs)))

(fn to-roman
([n] (to-roman n []))
([n s]
    (let [ones   (clojure.string/split "0 I II III IV V VI VII VIII IX" #" ")
          tens   (clojure.string/split "0 X XX XXX XL L LX LXX LXXX XC" #" ")
          hund   (clojure.string/split "0 C CC CCC CD D DC DCC DCCC CM" #" ") ]
    ;(println "to-roman" n s)
    (cond (zero?   n) (clojure.string/join s)
          (>= n 1000) (recur (- n 1000) (conj s "M"))
          (>= n 100 ) (let [h (quot n 100)]
                        (recur (- n (* 100 h)) (conj s (hund h))))
          (>= n 10  ) (let [t (quot n 10) ]
                        (recur (- n (* 10 t)) (conj s (tens t))))
          (>= n 1   ) (clojure.string/join (conj s (ones n))) ))
        ))

(let [table (sorted-map
             1000 "M"
             900 "CM"
             500 "D"
             400 "CD"
             100 "C"
             90 "XC"
             50 "L"
             40 "XL"
             10 "X"
             9 "IX"
             5 "V"
             4 "IV"
             1 "I")]
  (fn [n]
    (loop [i n acc ""]
      (if (zero? i)
        acc
        (let [[x y] (first (rsubseq table <= i))]
          (recur (- i x) (str acc y)))))))

(fn write-roman-numerals[num]
     (let[roman-number-map {"I" 1 "IV" 4 "V" 5 "IX" 9 
                            "X" 10 "XL" 40 "L" 50 "XC" 90 
                            "C" 100 "CD" 400 "D" 500  "CM" 900 "M" 1000}]
       (letfn[(step 
                [n]
                (if-not(zero? n)
                  (let[k (last (sort #(<(second %1) (second %2)) (filter #(<= (second %)  n) roman-number-map)))
                       q (quot n (second k))
                       r (rem n (second k))]
                    (lazy-cat (map (fn[_] (first k)) (range q))
                              (step r)))))]
         (apply str (step num)))))

(fn [n]
  (let [m {1 "I" 4 "IV" 5 "V" 9 "IX" 10 "X"
           40 "XL" 50 "L" 90 "XC" 100 "C"
           400 "CD" 500 "D" 900 "CM" 1000 "M"}
        a (sort > (keys m))]
    (letfn [(slice [n [a & arest :as alpha] out]
      (if (and (pos? n) alpha)
        (if (>= n a)
          (recur (- n a) alpha (conj out a))
          (recur n arest out))
        out))]
      (apply str (map m (slice n a []))))))

(fn [input]
  (let [decimal->roman-pairs [[1000 "M"]
   							  [900  "CM"]
   							  [500  "D"]
   							  [400  "CD"]
   							  [100  "C"]
   							  [90   "XC"]
   							  [50   "L"]
   							  [40   "XL"]
   							  [10   "X"]
   							  [9    "IX"]
   							  [5    "V"]
   							  [4    "IV"]
   							  [1    "I"]]]
  	(loop [[[k v] & xs :as pairs] decimal->roman-pairs
    	    n                     input
        	acc                   []]
   	 (if (zero? n)
    	  (apply str acc)
      	(if (>= n k)
        	(recur pairs (- n k) (conj acc v))
       	 (recur xs    n       acc))))))

(fn [x] 
       (letfn [(get-numeral [value one five ten] (cond (< value 4) (apply str (take value (repeat one)))
                                         (= value 4) (str one five)
                                         (< value 9) (str five (apply str (take (- value 5) (repeat one))))
                                         (= value 9) (str one ten)))]
         (apply str (reverse (map-indexed 
                      #(cond (= %1 0) (get-numeral (read-string %2) "I" "V" "X")
                             (= %1 1) (get-numeral (read-string %2) "X" "L" "C")
                             (= %1 2) (get-numeral (read-string %2) "C" "D" "M")
                             (= %1 3) (get-numeral (read-string %2) "M" "NA" "NA")
                             :else ""
            
           ) (reverse (re-seq #"\d" (str x))))))))

(fn int2roman [n]
    (let [rm (sorted-map 1 "I" 4 "IV" 5 "V"
                         9 "IX" 10 "X" 40 "XL"
                         50 "L" 90 "XC" 100 "C"
                         500 "D" 900 "CM" 1000 "M")
          largest-in (fn [n]
                       (last (filter #(<= % n) (keys rm))))
          ]
      (if (contains? rm n)
        (rm n)
        (let [nn (largest-in n)]
          (str (rm nn) (int2roman (- n nn)))))))

(fn [n] (let [dic {1 "I" 4 "IV" 5 "V" 9 "IX" 10 "X" 40 "XL" 50 "L" 90 "XC" 100 "C" 400 "CD" 500 "D" 900 "CM" 1000 "M"}

(fn arabic->roman [n]
  (let [ subs [
                 [1000 "M"]
                 [900 "CM"]
                 [500 "D"]
                 [400 "CD"]
                 [100 "C"]
                 [90 "XC"]
                 [50 "L"]
                 [40 "XL"]
                 [10 "X"]
                 [9 "IX"]
                 [5 "V"]
                 [4 "IV"]
                 [1 "I"]]
         reducto (fn reducto [n lst]
                  (if-let [[lim symb] (first lst)]
                   (if (<= lim n)
                    (cons symb (reducto (- n lim) lst))
                    (recur n (rest lst))))) ]
   
   (apply str (reducto n subs))))

(fn [x] (letfn [
(invert-map [m] (apply hash-map (flatten (map reverse (seq m)))))
(roman-to-arabic []
	{
  		"M" 1000,
  		"CM" 900,
  		"D" 500,
  		"CD" 400,
  		"C" 100,
  		"XC" 90,
  		"L" 50,
  		"XL" 40,
  		"X" 10,
  		"IX" 9,
  		"V" 5,
  		"IV" 4,
  		"I" 1
  	}
)
(arabic-to-roman [] (invert-map (roman-to-arabic)))
(descending-arabic-values [] (reverse (keys (into (sorted-map) (arabic-to-roman)))))
(read-roman-numerals [x]
  (let [val-map
  	{
  		"M" 1000,
  		"CM" 900,
  		"D" 500,
  		"CD" 400,
  		"C" 100,
  		"XC" 90,
  		"L" 50,
  		"XL" 40,
  		"X" 10,
  		"IX" 9,
  		"V" 5,
  		"IV" 4,
  		"I" 1}
        roman-re #"(?:C?M)|(?:C?D)|(?:X?C)|(?:X?L)|(?:I?X)|(?:I?V)|(?:I)"]
    (reduce + (map val-map (re-seq roman-re x)))))
(write-roman-numerals
	([n] (apply str (flatten (write-roman-numerals n (descending-arabic-values)))))
	([n values]
		(cond
			(empty? values)
			[]
			(zero? n)
			[]
			(zero? (quot n (first values)))
			(write-roman-numerals (rem n (first values)) (rest values))
			:else
			(cons
				(repeat (quot n (first values)) (get (arabic-to-roman) (first values)))
				(write-roman-numerals (rem n (first values)) (rest values))
			)
		)
	)
)
] (write-roman-numerals x)))

(fn foo [x]
  (let
    [numerals [1 5 10 50 100 500 1000 5000]
     numerals-map {1 "I" 5 "V" 10 "X" 50 "L" 100 "C" 500 "D" 1000 "M" 5000 ":-("}
     minuends [100 10 1]]
    (loop [x x
           str-so-far ""]
      (if
        (>= 0 x)
        str-so-far
        (let
          [biggest (first (filter #(<= % x) (reverse numerals)) )
           next-possible (first (filter #(> % biggest) numerals))
           possible-minuend (first (filter #(< % next-possible) minuends))]
          (if
            (>= x (- next-possible possible-minuend))
            (recur
              (- x (- next-possible possible-minuend)  )
              (str str-so-far (numerals-map possible-minuend) (numerals-map next-possible)))
            (recur
              (- x biggest)
              (str str-so-far (numerals-map biggest)))))))))

      (> val 999) (recur (- val 1000) (str roman "M"))
      (> val 899) (recur (- val 900) (str roman "CM"))
      (> val 499) (recur (- val 500) (str roman "D"))
      (> val 399) (recur (- val 400) (str roman "CD"))
      (> val 99) (recur (- val 100) (str roman "C"))
      (> val 89) (recur (- val 90) (str roman "XC"))
      (> val 49) (recur (- val 50) (str roman "L"))
      (> val 39) (recur (- val 40) (str roman "XL"))
      (> val 9) (recur (- val 10) (str roman "X"))
      (> val 8) (recur (- val 9) (str roman "IX"))
      (> val 4) (recur (- val 5) (str roman "V"))
      (> val 3) (recur (- val 4) (str roman "IV"))
      (> val 0) (recur (- val 1) (str roman "I"))
      :otherwise roman
      )
    )
  )

(fn to-roman [n]
  (let [integers [1000 500 100 50 10 5 1]
        int-to-roman {1000 "M" 500 "D" 100 "C" 50 "L" 10 "X" 5 "V" 1 "I"}
        possible-subtractions #{100 10 1}
        check-for-sub (fn [a b]
                        (if (> b 0)
                          (let [max-sub (reduce max  (filter #(<= % b) possible-subtractions))
                                adj-b (* max-sub (quot b max-sub))
                                c (- a adj-b)
                                sub-exists? (and (contains? possible-subtractions c)
                                                 (<= (/ 1 10) (/ adj-b a)))]
                            (if sub-exists?
                               [adj-b (concat (get int-to-roman c) (get int-to-roman a))]
                               false))
                          nil))]

    (loop [n2 n
           radii integers;(filter #(<= % n2) integers)
           acc ""]
      (let [radii (filter #(<= % n2) integers)
            possible-sub (last (filter #(> % n2) integers))
            has-sub (if possible-sub (check-for-sub possible-sub n2) false)]
         (if (= n2 0)
            (apply str acc)
            (let [n2 (- n2 (if has-sub (first has-sub) (first radii)))] 
              (recur n2 
                (filter #(<= % n2) radii) 
                (concat acc (if has-sub (second has-sub)
                                (get int-to-roman (first radii)))))))))))

(fn [n]
    (let [ribuan (quot n 1000)
          ratusan (quot (rem n 1000) 100)
          puluhan (quot (rem n 100) 10)
          satuan (rem n 10)
          r? (fn [a f1 b f2 c]
                      (and (f1 a b) (f2 b c)))]
        (apply str (concat (repeat ribuan \M)
                (cond (= 9 ratusan) (list \C \M)
                      (r? 5 <= ratusan <= 8) (cons \D (repeat (- ratusan 5) \C))
                      (= 4 ratusan) (list \C \D)
                      (r? 1 <= ratusan <= 3) (repeat ratusan \C))
                (cond (= 9 puluhan) (list \X \C)
                      (r? 5 <= puluhan <= 8) (cons \L (repeat (- puluhan 5) \X))
                      (= 4 puluhan) (list \X \L)
                      (r? 1 <= puluhan <= 3) (repeat puluhan \X))
                (cond (= 9 satuan) (list \I \X)
                      (r? 5 <= satuan <= 8) (cons \V (repeat (- satuan 5) \I))
                      (= 4 satuan) (list \I \V)
                      (r? 1 <= satuan <= 3) (repeat satuan \I))))))

(fn roman [n]
  (loop [rn [[1000 "M"] [900 "CM"] [500 "D"] [400 "CD"] 
           	 [100 "C"]  [90 "XC"]  [50 "L"]  [40 "XL"]
             [10 "X"]   [9 "IX"]   [5 "V"]   [4 "IV"] 
             [1 "I"]] 
         i n 
         res ""]
    (if (= i 0)
      res
      (let [rr (drop-while (fn [[f s]] (> f i)) rn)
            [f s] (first rr)]
        (recur (rest rr) (rem i f) (apply str res (repeat (quot i f) s)))))))

                                        (map (fn[c](- (int c) 48)) (reverse(str x))))))
             ))

        digits

     (apply str (map Ro digits)))

(fn numba
  ([x] (numba x []))
  ([x result]
   (cond
    (and (= x 0)) (apply str result)
    (and (< x 4)) (numba (- x 1) (conj result \I))
    (and (= x 4)) (numba (- x 4) (conj result \I \V))
    (and (< x 9) (>= x 5)) (numba (- x 5) (conj result \V))
    (and (< x 10) (>= x 9)) (numba (- x 9) (conj result \I \X))
    (and (< x 40) (>= x 10)) (numba (- x 10) (conj result \X))
    (and (< x 50) (>= x 40)) (numba (- x 40) (conj result \X \L))
    (and (< x 90) (>= x 50)) (numba (- x 50) (conj result \L))
    (and (< x 100) (>= x 90)) (numba (- x 90) (conj result \X \C))
    (and (< x 400) (>= x 100)) (numba (- x 100) (conj result \C))
    (and (< x 500) (>= x 400)) (numba (- x 400) (conj result \C \D))
    (and (< x 900) (>= x 500)) (numba (- x 500) (conj result \D))
    (and (< x 1000) (>= x 900)) (numba (- x 900) (conj result \C \M))
    (and (<= x 4000) (>= x 1000)) (numba (- x 1000) (conj result \M))
   )
  )
)

(fn [n]                                                                                                           ((fn convert [nu ss]                                                                                                          (println nu)                                                                                                       
     (if (== nu 0)                                                                                                      
       ""                                                                                                               
       (let [[n s] (first ss)]                                                                                          
         (if (>= nu n)                                                                                                  
           (.concat s (convert (- nu n) ss))                                                                               
           (convert nu (rest ss)))))                                                                                       
  ) n [[1000 "M"]                                                                                                          
       [900 "CM"] [800 "DCCC"] [700 "DCC"] [600 "DC"] [500 "D"] [400 "CD"] [100 "C"]                                    
       [90 "XC"]  [80 "LXXX"]  [70 "LXX"]  [60 "LX"]  [50 "L"]  [40 "XL"]  [10 "X"]                                      
       [9  "IX"]  [8  "VIII"]  [7  "VII"]  [6  "VI"]  [5  "V"]  [4 "IV"]  [1  "I"]])                                    
  )

(fn arabic->roman
  [n] {:pre [(integer? n), (< 0 n 4000)]}
  (let [
        ;; The function digits returns the digits of its argument, in decreasing
        ;; order of significance.
        digits
        (fn [n]
          (loop [n n, acc '()]
            (if (< n 10)
              (cons n acc)
              (recur (int (/ n 10)) (cons (rem n 10) acc)))))

        ;; The function pad adds leading zeroes to a sequence until the sequence
        ;; is the specified length.
        pad
        (fn [n coll]
          (if (> (count coll) n)
            coll
            (concat (repeat (- n (count coll)) 0) coll)))

        ;; In order to adhere to the subtractive principle, we need to keep
        ;; track of triples [A B C], where A is the Roman numeral for a power of
        ;; 10, B is the Roman numeral that is five times A, and C is the Roman
        ;; numeral that is ten times A. We store these triples in a vector, in
        ;; decreasing order of magnitude.
        dict
        [[\M nil nil] [\C \D \M] [\X \L \C] [\I \V \X]]

        ;; The function digit->roman returns the Roman numeral for a given digit
        ;; d, when also provided with the triple [a b c] from dict corresponding
        ;; to the intended magnitude of d.
        digit->roman
        (fn [d [a b c]]
          (cond
            (zero? d)  ""
            (< 0 d 4)  (apply str (repeat d a))
            (= d 4)    (str a b)
            (< 4 d 9)  (apply str b (repeat (- d 5) a))
            (= d 9)    (str a c)))]

    (apply str (map digit->roman
                    (->> n digits (pad 4))
                    dict))))

(fn [n]
  (let [m (partition 2 [1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I"])]
    (loop [x n, r ""]
      (if (zero? x) r
      (let [[a b] (some (fn [[a b]] (when (<= a x) [a b])) m)]
        (recur (- x a) (str r b)))))))

(and (= arg1 1)) "I"

(and (= arg1 4)) "IV"
(and (= arg1 140)) "CXL"
(and (= arg1 827)) "DCCCXXVII"
(and (= arg1 3999)) "MMMCMXCIX"

(fn [n]
  (let [trans {1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL"  10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I"}]
      (->> (reverse (sort (keys trans)))                                    ;; sorted base 1000, 900, 500 ...
           (reduce #(cons (rem (first %1) %2 )                              ;; keep last rem result in head
                          (cons [%2 (quot (first %1) %2)] (rest %1))) [n])  ;; append [base,quotient] per base
           rest reverse                                                     ;; rest remove last rem result (0)
           (map #(apply str (repeat (% 1) (trans (% 0)))))                  ;; convert [[base,quotient]] to ["quotient*trans[base]"]
           (apply str))))                                                   ;; then join to get final roman number

(fn [num] (let [digitized (map #(Character/digit %1 10) (flatten (partition 1 (str num))))
                  table (take-last (count digitized) [["" "M" "MM" "MMM" "MMMM" "MMMMM" "MMMMMM" "MMMMMMM" "MMMMMMMM" "MMMMMMMMM"]
                          ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]
                          ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]
                          ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]
                          ])
                  ]
              (clojure.string/join (reduce (fn [a b] (conj a (nth (nth table b) (nth digitized b))))
                       []
                       (range (count digitized))))))

(fn roman-numbers [n]
  (if (or (>= 0 n) (<= 4000 n)) ""
      (condp #(>= (- %2 %) 0) n
        1000 (str \M (roman-numbers (- n 1000)))
        900 (str "CM" (roman-numbers (- n 900)))
        500 (str \D (roman-numbers (- n 500)))
        400 (str "CD" (roman-numbers (- n 400)))
        100 (str \C (roman-numbers (- n 100)))
        90 (str "XC" (roman-numbers (- n 90)))
        50 (str \L (roman-numbers (- n 50)))
        40 (str "XL" (roman-numbers (- n 40)))
        10 (str \X (roman-numbers (- n 10)))
        9 (str "IX" (roman-numbers (- n 9)))
        5 (str \V (roman-numbers (- n 5)))
        4 (str "IV" (roman-numbers (- n 4)))
        1 (str \I (roman-numbers (- n 1))))))

(fn rnum [n]
  (let [r (sorted-map-by > 1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I")       
        m (some #(when (>= (- n %) 0) %) (keys r))]
  (when-not (nil? m)
    (str (r m) (rnum (- n m))))))

(fn t92 [value]
  (loop [n value  r ""]
    (cond
          (>= n 1000) (recur (- n 1000) (str r \M))
          (>= n 900) (recur (- n 900) (str r "CM"))
          (>= n 500) (recur (- n 500) (str r \D))

(fn [n]
  (when (and (< n 4000) (> n 0))
    (loop [n n
           m {1000 "M"
              900  "CM"
              500  "D"
              400  "CD"
              100  "C"
              90   "XC"
              50   "L"
              40   "XL"
              10   "X"
              9    "IX"
              5    "V"
              4    "IV"
              1    "I"}
           [f & d] (reverse (sort (keys m)))
           r []]
      (if (zero? n)
        (apply str (flatten r))
        (recur (mod n f) m d (conj r (repeat (unchecked-divide-int n f) (m f))))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [r clojure.string/replace]
    (-> (loop [s   ""
               n   n
               x [[1000 \M]
                  [ 500 \D]
                  [ 100 \C]
                  [  50 \L]
                  [  10 \X]
                  [   5 \V]
                  [   1 \I]]]
          (if (empty? x)
            s
            (let [[d c] (first x)]
              (recur
                (str s (apply str (repeat (quot n d) c)))
                (mod n d)
                (rest x)))))
      (r "DCCCC" "CM")
      (r  "CCCC" "CD")
      (r "LXXXX" "XC")
      (r  "XXXX" "XL")
      (r "VIIII" "IX")
      (r  "IIII" "IV"))))

(fn mywr [n]
  (let [pow10 #(reduce * 1 (repeat % 10))
        srep #(apply str (repeat %1 %2))
        dig #(quot (mod %1 (pow10 (inc %2))) (pow10 %2))
        r [{1 \I 5 \V} {1 \X 5 \L} {1 \C 5 \D} {1 \M}]
        ]
    (apply str 
           (for [x (reverse (range 4))]
             (let [d (dig n x) s (r x)]
               (cond
                (= d 4) (str (s 1) (s 5))
                (= d 9) (str (s 1) ((r (inc x)) 1))
                (>= d 5) (str (s 5) (srep (- d 5) (s 1)))
                (< d 4) (srep d (s 1))
                )))
           )
    )
  )

(fn nr ([n] (nr n []))
  ([n s] 
   (condp <= n 
     1000 (nr (- n 1000) (conj s \M))
     900 (nr (- n 900) (conj  s \C \M))
     500  (nr (- n 500) (conj s \D))
     400 (nr (- n 400) (conj s \C \D))
     100  (nr (- n 100) (conj s \C))
     90   (nr (- n 90) (conj s \X \C))
     50   (nr (- n 50) (conj s \L))
     40   (nr (- n 40) (conj s \X \L))
     10 (nr (- n 10) (conj s \X))
     9  (nr (- n 9) (conj s \I \X))
     5  (nr (- n 5) (conj s \V))
     4  (nr (- n 4) (conj s \I \V))
     1  (nr (- n 1) (conj s \I))
     (apply str s))))

(letfn [(f [n [a b c]]
          (cond
            (= n 9) (str a c)
            (= n 5) b
            (= n 4) (str a b)
            (> n 5) (str b (apply str (repeat (- n 5) a)))
            :else (apply str (repeat n a))))]
  (fn [n] 
    (str
      (f (quot n 1000) [\M \V \X])
      (f (quot (rem n 1000) 100) [\C \D \M])
      (f (quot (rem n 100) 10) [\X \L \C])
      (f (rem n 10) [\I \V \X]))))

(fn [n]
  (let [numerals {1    [\I \V] 
                  10   [\X \L] 
                  100  [\C \D] 
                  1000 [\M]}]
    (->>
      (iterate #(quot % 10) n)
      (take-while pos?)
      (map (fn [p x]
           (let [d (rem x 10)
                 [n1 n5] (numerals p)
                 [n10 _] (numerals (* 10 p))]
             (condp > d
               4 (repeat d n1)
               5 [n1 n5]
               9 (cons n5 (repeat (- d 5) n1))
               [n1 n10])))
         (iterate #(* 10 %) 1))
      reverse flatten (apply str))))

(fn c [n]
  (if (zero? n)
    ""
    (let [numerals {1000 "M", 900 "CM", 500 "D", 400 "CD", 100 "C", 90 "XC", 50 "L", 40 "XL", 10 "X", 9 "IX", 5 "V", 4 "IV", 1 "I"}
          detect (fn [p c] (first (filter p c)))
          less-than? (fn [x y] (>= x y))
          [arabic roman] (detect #(less-than? n (first %)) (reverse (into (sorted-set) numerals)))]
    (str roman (c (- n arabic))))))

(fn
  [n]
 
  ((fn acc [
      remainder       ; Remaining (unrepresented) decimal part of the number
      roman-rep       ; Roman numeral representation built so far
    ]
    (cond
      (>= remainder 1000) (acc (- remainder 1000) (str roman-rep "M" ))
      (>= remainder  900) (acc (- remainder  900) (str roman-rep "CM"))
      (>= remainder  500) (acc (- remainder  500) (str roman-rep "D" ))
      (>= remainder  400) (acc (- remainder  400) (str roman-rep "CD"))
      (>= remainder  100) (acc (- remainder  100) (str roman-rep "C" ))
      (>= remainder   90) (acc (- remainder   90) (str roman-rep "XC"))
      (>= remainder   50) (acc (- remainder   50) (str roman-rep "L" ))
      (>= remainder   40) (acc (- remainder   40) (str roman-rep "XL"))
      (>= remainder   10) (acc (- remainder   10) (str roman-rep "X" ))
      (>= remainder    9) (acc (- remainder    9) (str roman-rep "IX"))
      (>= remainder    5) (acc (- remainder    5) (str roman-rep "V" ))
      (>= remainder    4) (acc (- remainder    4) (str roman-rep "IV"))
      (>= remainder    1) (acc (- remainder    1) (str roman-rep "I" ))
      :else roman-rep)) n ""))

        r (fn [[s n] k]

(fn roman [n]
  (let [s   (map #(Character/digit % 10) (clojure.pprint/cl-format nil "~4,'0d" (str n)))
        tho (zipmap (range 4) '(nil M MM MMM))
        hun (zipmap (range 10) '(nil C CC CCC CD D DC DCC DCCC CM))
        ten (zipmap (range 10) '(nil X XX XXX XL L LX LXX LXXX XC))
        uni (zipmap (range 10) '(nil I II III IV V VI VII VIII IX))
        m (map vector s [tho hun ten uni])]
    (->> (map #(val (find (second %) (first %))) m)
         (filter identity)
         (map str)
         (clojure.string/join))))

(fn roman[i] (apply str (let [a (quot i 1000) b (quot (rem i 1000) 100) c (quot (rem i 100) 10) d (rem i 10)]
                             (concat (repeat a "M")
                                     (cond (< b 4) (repeat b "C")
                                           (= b 4) ["C" "D"]
                                           (= 9 b) ["CM"]
                                           (= b 5) ["D"]
                                           (<= 6 b) [(str "D" (apply str (repeat (- b 5) "C")))])
                                     (cond (< c 4) (repeat c "X")
                                           (= c 4) ["X" "L"]
                                           (= 9 c) ["XC"]
                                           (= c 5) ["L"]
                                           (<= 6 c) [(str "L" (apply str (repeat (- c 5) "X")))])
                                     (cond (< d 4) (repeat d "I")
                                           (= d 4) ["I" "V"]
                                           (= 9 d) ["IX"]
                                           (= d 5) ["V"]
                                           (<= 6 d) [(str "V" (apply str (repeat (- d 5) "I")))])
                                     ))))

            (cond
                (>= y 1000) ["M" (- y 1000)]

(fn [n]
    (let [cd (fn [i n]
               (let [ls (drop (* 2 i) [\I \V \X \L \C \D \M \v \x])
                     r5 (rem  n 5)]
                 (clojure.string/join
                   ""
                   (cond
                     (= 4 n)    [(first ls) (second ls)]
                     (= 9 n)    [(first ls) (nth ls 2)]
                     :else      (reduce conj
                                        (if (< n 5) [] [(second ls)])
                                        (repeat r5 (first ls)))))))
          ds (->> n
                  str
                  seq
                  reverse
                  (map (comp read-string str))
                  (map-indexed #(cd %1 %2))
                  reverse)]
      (clojure.string/join "" ds)))

(fn [n]
  (let [p10-rn {1 ["I" "V" "X"] 10 ["X" "L" "C"] 100 ["C" "D" "M"] 1000 ["M"]}
        prs-rn (fn [n [u f t]]
                 (cond
                   (zero? n)  ""
                   (< 0 n 4)  (apply str (take n (repeat u)))
                   (= n 4)    (apply str (concat u f))
                   (= n 5)    f
                   (< 5 n 9)  (apply str (concat f (take (- n 5) (repeat u))))
                   :else      (apply str (concat u t))))
        map-n (fn [n]
                (->> (str n)
                     seq
                     (map (comp read-string str))
                     reverse
                     (zipmap [1 10 100 1000])))
        n-map (map-n n)
        create-rn (fn [k]
                    (prs-rn (n-map k) (p10-rn k)))
        pwrs (take (count n-map) [1 10 100 1000])]
    (reduce #(apply str (concat (create-rn %2) %1)) "" pwrs)))

       (nth ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"] u)]
      flatten
      (apply str))))

(fn num->rome 
  ([num] (num->rome num ""))
  ([num repr] 
   (if (= num 0) repr
    (let [romans [[1000 "M"]
                 [900 "CM"]
                 [500 "D"]
                 [400 "CD"]
                 [100 "C"]
                 [90 "XC"]
                 [50 "L"]
                 [40 "XL"]
                 [10 "X"]
                 [9 "IX"]
                 [5 "V"]
                 [4 "IV"]
                 [1 "I"]]
         distances (map (fn [[number repr]] [(- num number) number repr]) romans)
         legit-dist (filter (fn [[dist _ _]] (>= dist 0)) distances)
         [d num' repr'] (apply min-key (fn [[dist _ _]] dist) legit-dist)]
      (recur (Math/abs (- num num')) (str repr repr'))))))

           n n
           acc ""]
      (if (nil? d)
        acc
        (let [res (loop [n n acc acc c 0]
                    (if (< n d)
                      [acc c]
                      (recur (- n d) (str acc (get digs d)) (inc c))))]
          (recur ds (- n (* d (get res 1))) (get res 0)))))))

(fn roman [n]
  (let [nmap (sorted-map
               1000 \M
               900  "CM"
               500  \D
               400  "CD"
               100  \C
               90   "XC"
               50   \L
               40   "XL"
               10   \X
               9    "IX"
               5    \V
               4    "IV"
               1    \I)]
    (loop [n'  n
           acc ""]
      (if (> n' 0)
        (let [newmap (last (subseq nmap <= n'))]
          (recur (- n' (first newmap)) (str acc (last newmap))))
        acc))))

#(letfn [(romanNum[n one five ten]
                  (cond
                   (<= n 3) (apply str (repeat n one))
                   (= n 4) (str one five)
                   (>= n 9) (str one ten)
                   :else (str five (apply str (repeat (- n 5) one)))))
         (romanLetter[n]
                     (cond
                      (= n 1000) (list "M" nil nil)
                      (= n 100) (list "C" "D" "M")
                      (= n 10) (list "X" "L" "C")
                      :else (list "I" "V" "X")))]
   (loop[n % u 1000 r ""]
       (if
        (= n 0) r
        (let[qn (quot n u)
          rn (rem n u)
          nr (str r (apply romanNum qn (romanLetter u)))]
          (recur (- n (* qn u)) (quot u 10) nr)))))

(fn decimal->roman
  [n]
  (let [num->roman {1    "I"
                    4    "IV"
                    5    "V"
                    9    "IX"
                    10   "X"
                    40   "XL"
                    50   "L"
                    90   "XC"
                    100  "C"
                    400  "CD"
                    500  "D"
                    900  "CM"
                    1000 "M"}]
    (->> num->roman
         (sort-by key >)
         (reduce (fn [{:keys [rem result]} [div chars]]
                   (let [x (int (Math/floor (/ rem div)))]
                     {:rem (- rem (* x div))
                      :result (str result (apply str (repeat x chars)))}))
                 {:rem n :result ""})
         :result)))

(fn to-roman [n]
        (let [m {1000 [\M 0 0] 100 [\C \D \M]
                 10 [\X \L \C] 1 [\I \V \X]}
              o (map #(list (- (int %) 48) %2) (str n)
                     (take-last (count (str n)) [1000 100 10 1]))]
          (apply str (flatten
            (map (fn [[a b]]
                   (let [[p q r] (get m b)]
                     (cond
                      (< a 4) (repeat a p)
                      (= a 4) [p q]
                      (< a 9) (concat [q] (repeat (- a 5) p))
                      :else   [p r])))
                 o)))))

    (:ret (reduce #(if (zero? (quot (:num %) (first %2)))
               {:ret (:ret %) :num (:num %)}
               {:ret (str (:ret %) (apply str (repeat (quot (:num %) (first %2)) (second %2))))
               :num (mod (:num %) (first %2))})
            {:ret "" :num n} roman-map))))

                        (cond

                          (= 7 n) (str v i i)

                                (90 "XC") (50 "L") (40 "XL") (10 "X") (9 "IX") (5 "V") (4 "IV") (1 "I"))]
                  (loop [toConsider mapping num x res ""] 
                    (cond
                     (= 0 num) res

(fn to-roman [n]
  (letfn [(roman-u [n]
            (case (rem n 10)
              0 ""
              1 "I"
              2 "II"
              3 "III"
              4 "IV"
              5 "V"
              6 "VI"
              7 "VII"
              8 "VIII"
              9 "IX"))
          (roman-t [n]
            (if (< n 10)
              ""
              (case (-> n (quot 10) (rem 10))
                0 ""
                1 "X"
                2 "XX"
                3 "XXX"
                4 "XL"
                5 "L"
                6 "LX"
                7 "LXX"
                8 "LXXX"
                9 "XC")))
          (roman-h [n]
            (if (< n 100)
              ""
              (case (-> n (quot 100) (rem 10))
                0 ""
                1 "C"
                2 "CC"
                3 "CCC"
                4 "CD"
                5 "D"
                6 "DC"
                7 "DCC"
                8 "DCCC"
                9 "CM")))
          (roman-th [n]
            (-> n
                (quot 1000)
                (repeat \M)
                clojure.string/join))]
    (str (roman-th n)
         (roman-h n)
         (roman-t n)
         (roman-u n))))

(fn [n]
  (let [numerals {"M" 1000 "CM" 900 "D" 500 "CD" 400 "C" 100 "XC" 90
                  "L" 50 "XL" 40 "X" 10 "IX" 9 "V" 5 "IV" 4 "I" 1}
        dec->roman (fn [n]
                     (loop [n n [[c v] & nums :as all] (reverse (sort-by val numerals)) acc []]
                       (cond
                         (zero? n) (apply str acc) ;;if the number is zero, return an empty string
                         (> v n) (recur n nums acc)
                         :else (recur (- n v) all (conj acc c)))))]
    (dec->roman n)))

(fn write-roman
  [num]
  (loop [data {1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I"}
         data-keys (reverse (sort (keys data)))
         remaining num
         res []]
    (cond
      (zero? remaining) (apply str res)
      (empty? data-keys) (apply str res)
      (> (quot remaining (first data-keys)) 0) (recur data data-keys (- remaining (first data-keys))
                                                (conj res (data (first data-keys))))
      (= (quot remaining (first data-keys)) 0) (recur data (rest data-keys) remaining
                                                      res))))

(fn Num->Roman
  [n]
  (let [;; static maps
        digit-map (zipmap (range 1 11) [1 11 111 15 5 51 511 5111 9])
        expo-map (zipmap [0 1 5 9 10 50 90 100 500 900 1000] ["" "I" "V" "IX" "X" "L" "XC" "C" "D" "CM" "M"])
        ;; helper functions
        digits (fn [n] (map #(- (int %) 48) (str n)))
        pow (fn [a b] (reduce * (repeat b a)))
        to (fn [a b] (range a (dec b) -1))
        ;; steps
        step1 (map digit-map (digits n))
        step2 (map digits step1) ;;((1 1 0) (1 0 1)....)
        step3 (map #(map (fn [n] (* n (pow 10 (dec %2)))) %) step2 (to (count step2) 1))
        step4 (mapcat #(map expo-map %) step3)
        final (apply str step4)]
    final))

(fn [n] 
    (let [romans "IVXLCDM__"
          groups (partition 3 2 romans)
          digits (reverse (map #(Character/digit % 10) (str n)))]
         (apply str (reverse (map 
              (fn [digit [I V X]] 
                    (condp = digit
                      0 ""
                      1 (str I)
                      2 (str I I)
                      3 (str I I I)
                      4 (str I V)
                      5 (str V)
                      6 (str V I)
                      7 (str V I I)
                      8 (str V I I I)
                      9 (str I X))) 
              digits groups)))))

  (let [romans {1    "I"
                4    "IV"

                10   "X"

                50   "L"
                90   "XC"
                100  "C"
                400  "CD"
                500  "D"
                900  "CM"
                1000 "M"}
        nums (sort > (keys romans))]
    (loop [curr n roman []]
      (if-let [closest (first (drop-while #(> % curr) nums))]
        (recur (- curr closest) (conj roman (romans closest)))
        (apply str roman)))))

(fn __ [n]
  (let [k (int (/ n 1000))
        h (mod (int (/ n 100)) 10)
        t (mod (int (/ n 10)) 10)
        o (mod n 10)
        f (fn [i c half C]
            (cond
              (= i 9) [c C]
              (= i 4) [c half]
              (= i 5) [half]
              (> i 5) (concat [half] (repeat (- i 5) c))
              :else (repeat i c)))
        K (repeat k "M")
        H (f h "C" "D" "M")
        T (f t "X" "L" "C")
        O (f o "I" "V" "X")]
    (apply str (concat K H T O))))

		ones ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]

	(apply str (reverse (map-indexed #((roms %) %2) (reverse digits))))))

(fn [number] 
  (let [numerals [["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]
				  ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]
				  ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]
 				  ["" "M" "MM" "MMM"]]
        digits (->> number str (re-seq #"\d") (map #(Integer/parseInt %)) reverse)]
    (->> digits 
         (map-indexed (fn [y x] (-> numerals (nth y) (nth x))))
    	 reverse
         (apply str ))))

(fn [n]
  (let [nr {1 "I", 4 "IV", 100 "C", 900 "CM", 5 "V", 40 "XL", 
            1000 "M", 9 "IX", 10 "X", 400 "CD", 50 "L", 500 "D", 90 "XC"}
        ks-init (reverse (sort (keys nr)))]
    (loop [n n ks ks-init acc ""]
      (cond
        (= n 0) acc
        (empty? ks) "RAISE ERROR"
        :else (if (>= n (first ks))
                (recur (- n (first ks)) ks (str acc (nr (first ks))))
                (recur n (rest ks) acc))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [numerals {"M" 1000 "CM" 900 "D" 500 "CD" 400 "C" 100 "XC" 90 "L" 50 "XL" 40 "X" 10 "IX" 9 "V" 5 "IV" 4 "I" 1}
        dec->roman (fn [n]
                     (loop [n n [[c v] & nums :as all] (reverse (sort-by val numerals)) acc []]
                       (cond
                         (zero? n) (apply str acc)
                         (> v n) (recur n nums acc)
                         :else (recur (- n v) all (conj acc c)))))]
    (dec->roman n)))

(fn roman [n]
 (let [digits (map read-string (map str (seq (str n))))
       paddigits (concat (take (- 4 (count digits)) (repeat 0))
                         digits)]
   (letfn
     [(decode [d pos]
        (nth (nth [["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]
                   ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]
                   ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]
                   ["" "M" "MM" "MMM"]]
                    pos)
              d))]
    (apply str (map decode paddigits '(3 2 1 0))))))

(fn __ [num]
  (let [nums-to-romans {1 "I" 5 "V" 10 "X" 50 "L" 100 "C" 500 "D" 1000 "M"}
        subtrahend? (fn [num]
                      (let [powers (set (take-while #(<= % num) (iterate #(* % 10) 1)))]
                        (contains? powers num)))
        values (->> nums-to-romans keys sort reverse (filter subtrahend?))
        to-string (fn [divider amount]
									  (if (zero? amount)
									    ""
									    (if-let [upper (nums-to-romans (* divider (inc amount)))]
									      (str (nums-to-romans divider) upper)
									      (if (>= amount 5)
									        (apply str (nums-to-romans (* divider 5)) (repeat (- amount 5) (nums-to-romans divider)))
									        (apply str (repeat amount (nums-to-romans divider)))))))]
    (loop [n num
           dividers values
           current ""]
	      (if (empty? dividers)
          current
	        (let [divider (first dividers)
                amount (quot n divider)
	              string-equiv (to-string divider amount)]
           (recur 
             (- n (* amount divider))
             (rest dividers)
             (str current string-equiv)))))))

(fn roman-encode
  [v]
  (let [rn (sorted-map-by > 1 "I"
                          4 "IV" 5 "V"
                          9 "IX" 10 "X"
                          40 "XL" 50 "L"
                          90 "XC" 100 "C"
                          400 "CD" 500 "D"
                          900 "CM" 1000 "M")]
    (letfn [(f [v [rf & r]]
              (when-not (nil? rf)
                (let [q  (quot v rf)
                      rm (rem v rf)]
                  (if (= 0 q)
                    (f rm r)
                    (str (apply str (repeat q (rn rf)))
                         (f rm r))))))]
      (f v (keys rn)))))

(fn [n]
  (let [basis {"I" 1 "V" 5 "X" 10 "L" 50 "C" 100 "D" 500 "M" 1000}
        validpairs ["IV" "IX" "XL" "XC" "CD" "CM"]
        pairs (for [[l r] validpairs]
                {(str l r) (reduce - (map (fn [l] (basis (str l))) [r l]))})
        singles (into basis pairs)
        byval (into {} (map (fn [[k v]] [v k]) singles))
        mults (mapcat
               (fn [[k v]]
                 (take-while (fn [[rn rnv]]
                               (and (not (byval rnv))
                                    (< rnv 4000)))
                       (iterate
                        (fn [[rn rnv]]
                          [(str rn k) (+ rnv v)])
                        [(str k k) (+ v v)])))
               basis)
        allnums (into singles mults)
        byval (into {} (map (fn [[k v]] [v k]) allnums))
        nums (keys byval)]
    (letfn [(->rom [n]
              (if (pos? n)
                (let [avail (filter #(<= % n) nums)]
                  (if (seq avail)
                    (let [m (apply max avail)
                          s (byval m)]
                      (str s (->rom (- n m))))
                    ""))
                ""))]
      (->rom n))))

(fn a [n]
  (let [ones [nil "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]
        tens [nil "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]
        huns [nil "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]
        thos [nil "M" "MM" "MMM"]
        m (quot n 1000)
        h (quot (rem n 1000) 100)
        t (quot (rem n 100) 10)
        o (rem n 10)]
    (str (thos m) (huns h) (tens t) (ones o))))

(fn write-roman [n]
  (let [decomp {0 []
                1 [:one]
                2 [:one :one]
                3 [:one :one :one]
                4 [:one :five]
                5 [:five]
                6 [:five :one]
                7 [:five :one :one]
                8 [:five :one :one :one]
                9 [:one :ten]}
        transl {0 {:one "I" :five "V" :ten "X"}
                1 {:one "X" :five "L" :ten "C"}
                2 {:one "C" :five "D" :ten "M"}
                3 {:one "M" :five "?" :ten "?"}}]
    (letfn [(digits [n]
              (loop [n n
                     r '()]
                (if (= n 0)
                  r
                  (recur (quot n 10) (conj r (rem n 10))))))
            (roman [d e]
              (let [t (transl e)
                    p (decomp d)]
                (reduce #(str %1 (t %2)) "" p)))]
      (loop [s (digits n)
             r ""]
        (if (empty? s)
          r
          (recur (rest s) (str r (roman (first s) (dec (count s))))))))))

(fn to-roman-numerals [n]
  (let [table [[1000 "M"]
               [900 "CM"]
               [500 "D"]
               [400 "CD"]
               [100 "C"]
               [90 "XC"]
               [50 "L"]
               [40 "XL"]
               [10 "X"]
               [9 "IX"]
               [5 "V"]
               [4 "IV"]
               [1 "I"]]]
               
    (loop [n n
           r ""
           c 1000]
      (when-not (zero? c)
        (if (zero? n)
          r
          (let [[nr st] (first (filter (fn [[nr st]] (>= n nr)) table))]
            (recur (- n nr) (str r st) (dec c))))))))

(fn solution [decimal]
  (let [dict {1    "I"
              4    "IV"
              5    "V"
              9    "IX"
              10   "X"
              40   "XL"
              50   "L"
              90   "XC"
              100  "C"
              400  "CD"
              500  "D"
              900  "CM"
              1000 "M"
              4000 "INF"}]
    (loop [result ""
           number decimal]
      (let [divisor (last (take-while #(<= % number) (sort (keys dict))))]
        (if (zero? number)
          result
          (recur (apply str result
                        (repeat (quot number divisor) (get dict divisor)))
                 (rem number divisor)))))))

(fn to-roman [arabic]
(let [
digits [1 5 10 50 100 500 1000]
values {1 "I", 5 "V", 10 "X", 50 "L", 100 "C", 500 "D", 1000 "M"}
subs {"IIII" "IV", "VIIII" "IX", "XXXX" "XL", 
      "LXXXX" "XC", "CCCC" "CD", "DCCCC" "CM"}
mcg (fn mcg
  ([total bills so-far]
   (let [b (first bills)
         new-total (rem total b)
         n (quot total b)
         new-so-far (assoc so-far b n)
         new-bills (filter #(<= % new-total) bills)]
     (if (zero? new-total) new-so-far
       (recur new-total new-bills new-so-far))))
  ([total bills]
   (mcg total
    (reverse (take-while #(<= % total) bills)) {})))
raw (apply str (reverse (flatten (map (fn [[k v]] (repeat v (values k))) (mcg arabic digits)))))]
  (reduce (fn [s [b a]](.replace s b a)) raw (reverse subs))))

(fn [x]
  (letfn [(foo [val n]
            (let [vvals {1 "I" 5 "V" 10 "X" 50 "L" 100 "C" 500 "D" 1000 "M"}
                  letter (vvals val)
                  quantity (int (/ n val))]
              (cond (and (= 1000 val) (= 9 (int (/ (- n (* quantity val)) 100))))
                    [[[letter quantity] ["C" 1] ["M" 1]] (- (mod n val) 900)]
                    (and (= 100 val) (= 9 (int (/ (- n (* quantity val)) 10))))
                    [[[letter quantity] ["X" 1] ["C" 1]] (- (mod n val) 90)]
                    (and (= 50 val) (= 4 (int (/ n 10))))
                    [[[letter quantity] ["X" 1] ["L" 1]] (- n 40)]
                    (and (= 10 val) (= 9 (int (/ (- n (* quantity val)) 1))))
                    [[[letter quantity] ["I" 1] ["X" 1]] (- (mod n val) 9)]
                    (and (= 5 val) (= n 4))
                    [[[letter quantity] ["I" 1] ["V" 1]] 0]          
                    :else [[letter quantity] (mod n val)])))
          (roman [num]
            (loop [r [] n num v [1000 500 100 50 10 5 1]]
              (if (empty? v)
                r
                (let [[rseqe nn] (foo (first v) n)]
                  (recur (conj r rseqe) nn (rest v))))))
          (rr [n]
            (filter #(not= 0 (second %))
                    (partition 2 2 (flatten (roman n)))))
          (to-roman [r]
            (apply str (flatten (map #(repeat (second %) (first %)) r))))]
    (to-roman (rr x))))

#(loop [n % t "IVXLCDM" r '()]
  (if (= n 0) (apply str r)
    (let [m (mod n 10)]
      (case m
        (9 4) (recur (- n (dec m)) t (conj r (nth t (quot m 4))))
        (recur (quot n 10) (drop 2 t)
               (conj (reduce conj r (repeat (mod m 5) (first t)))
                     (when (> m 4)
                       (second t))))))))

(fn [ara-num]
  (let [rom-num-vec [[1000 \M] [500 \D] [100 \C] [50 \L]
                     [10 \X] [5 \V] [1 \I]]
        short-vec [["DCCCC" "CM"] ["CCCC" "CD"] 
                   ["LXXXX" "XC"] ["XXXX" "XL"]
                   ["VIIII" "IX"] ["IIII" "IV"]]
        subnot (fn sn [rns sv]
                 (if (empty? sv)
                   rns
                   (let [[old new] (first sv)]
                     (sn (clojure.string/replace-first rns old new) (rest sv)))))]
    (loop [out [] in ara-num rn rom-num-vec]
      (if (or (= in 0) (empty? rn))
        (subnot (apply str out) short-vec)
        (let [[n c] (first rn)]
          (if (>= in n)
             (recur (conj out c) (- in n) rn)
             (recur out in (rest rn))))))))

(letfn [(f [b l n]
          (-> [(apply str (repeat (int (/ n b)) l)) (rem n b)]))]
  (let [fs (map (fn [[b l]] (partial f b l))
                (partition 2 [1000 \M 900 "CM" 500 \D 400 "CD" 100 \C 90 "XC"
                              50 \L 40 "XL" 10 \X 9 "IX" 5 \V 4 "IV" 1 \I]))]
    (fn [n]
      (loop [fs fs n n v []]
        (if (seq fs)
          (let [[cs r] ((first fs) n)]
            (recur (rest fs) r (conj v cs)))
          (apply str v))))))

(fn roman [x]
  (let [digits (reverse (map #(- (int %) 48) (str x)))
        place-roman (fn [p] (case p 1 \I 2 \X 3 \C 4 \M))
        half-roman (fn [p] (case p 1 \V 2 \L 3 \D))
        compute-place (fn [y p] (cond 
                                  (= y 9) [(place-roman p) (place-roman (+ p 1))]
                                  (>= y 5) (cons (half-roman p) (repeat (- y 5) (place-roman p)))
                                  (= y 4) [(place-roman p) (half-roman p)]
                                  :else (repeat y (place-roman p))))
        compute-places (fn cplaces ([p y & ys] (concat (apply cplaces (cons (+ p 1) ys)) (compute-place y p)))                    
                             	   ([p] []))]
    (apply str (apply compute-places (cons 1 digits)))))

(fn [n]
 (let [a [1000,900,500,400,100,90,50,40,10,9,5,4,1]
       c (zipmap a ["M","CM","D","CD","C","XC","L","XL","X","IX","V","IV","I"])]
  (loop [n n [h & t :as all] a s ""]
   (cond
    (< n 1) s
    (< n h) (recur n t s)
    :else (recur (- n h) all (str s (c h)))))))

(fn dec2roman [d]
  (let [v (map vector [1000 900 500 400 100 90 50 40 10 9 5 4 1]
               ["M" "CM" "D" "CD" "C" "XC" "L" "XL" "X" "IX" "V" "IV" "I"])
        convert (fn conv [x smap]
                  (if (= 0 x)
                    []
                    (if (>= x (ffirst smap))
                      (lazy-seq (cons (second (first smap)) (conv (- x (ffirst smap)) smap)))
                      (conv x (rest smap)))))]
    (apply str (convert d v))))

(fn [n]
  (let [rns {4 "M" 3.5 "D" 3 "C" 2.5 "L" 2 "X" 1.5 "V" 1 "I"}
        ds (map #(Integer/parseInt (str %)) (str n))
        ids (map-indexed #(vector (- (count ds) %1) %2) ds)]
    (letfn [(r [i n]
              (cond
                (= n 9) [(rns i) (rns (+ i 1))]
                (= n 4) [(rns i) (rns (+ i 0.5))]
                (>= n 5) (concat (rns (+ i 0.5)) (repeat (- n 5) (rns i)))
                :else (repeat n (rns i))))]
      (apply str (reduce #(concat %1 (r (first %2) (second %2))) [] ids)))))

(fn roman-str [n]
            (let [roman-numbers (partition 2 ["M" 1000 "CM" 900 "D" 500 "CD" 400 "C" 100
                                              "XC" 90 "L" 50 "XL" 40 "X" 10 "IX" 9 "V" 5 "IV" 4 "I" 1])]
              (if (zero? n)
                ""
                (let [[letters number] (first (drop-while #(> (second %) n) roman-numbers))]
                  (str letters (roman-str (- n number)))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [ones ({0 "" 1 "I" 2 "II" 3 "III" 4 "IV" 5 "V" 6 "VI" 7 "VII" 8 "VIII" 9 "IX"} (mod n 10))
        tens ({0 "" 1 "X" 2 "XX" 3 "XXX" 4 "XL" 5 "L" 6 "LX" 7 "LXX" 8 "LXXX" 9 "XC"} (int (/ (mod n 100) 10)))
        huns ({0 "" 1 "C" 2 "CC" 3 "CCC" 4 "CD" 5 "D" 6 "DC" 7 "DCC" 8 "DCCC" 9 "CM"} (int (/ (mod n 1000) 100)))
        thos ({0 "" 1 "M" 2 "MM" 3 "MMM"} (int (/ (mod n 10000) 1000)))]
    (str thos huns tens ones)))

(fn f [n] 
  (if (> n 0)
   (let [ir (sorted-map 1 "I" 4 "IV" 5 "V" 9 "IX" 10 "X" 
			      40 "XL" 50 "L" 90 "XC" 100 "C" 400 "CD" 
			      500 "D" 900 "CM" 1000 "M")
	       m (last (filter #(<= % n) (keys ir)))]
	   (str (ir m) (f (- n m))))))

(fn arabic->roman [d]
  {:pre [(< d 4000)]}
  (loop [d d res ""]
    (condp #(>= %2 %1) d
      1000 (recur (- d 1000) (str res "M"))
      900 (recur (- d 900) (str res "CM"))
      500 (recur (- d 500) (str res "D"))
      400 (recur (- d 400) (str res "CD"))
      100 (recur (- d 100) (str res "C"))
      90 (recur (- d 90) (str res "XC"))
      50 (recur (- d 50) (str res "L"))
      40 (recur (- d 40) (str res "XL"))
      10 (recur (- d 10) (str res "X"))
      9 (recur (- d 9) (str res "IX"))
      5 (recur (- d 5) (str res "V"))
      4 (recur (- d 4) (str res "IV"))
      1 (recur (- d 1) (str res "I"))
      res)))

#(letfn[(genRoman [value, oneVal, oneSym, fiveSym, tenSym]
                  (let [quoted (quot value oneVal)]
                    (cond
                     (= quoted 9) (list tenSym oneSym)
                     (= quoted 4) (list fiveSym oneSym)
                     (= quoted 5) (list fiveSym)
                     (> quoted 5) (concat (repeat (- quoted 5) oneSym) (list fiveSym))
                     :else (repeat quoted oneSym))))]
  (loop [value %, result '(), steps [1000, 100, 10 1]]
    (let [step (first steps)]
      (cond
       (= step 1) (apply str (reverse (concat (genRoman value 1 \I \V \X) result)))
       (= step 10) (recur (rem value 10) (concat (genRoman value 10 \X \L \C) result) (rest steps))
       (= step 100) (recur (rem value 100) (concat (genRoman value 100 \C \D \M) result) (rest steps))
       :else (recur (rem value 1000) (concat (genRoman value 1000 \M \v \c) result) (rest steps))))))

(fn [arabic]
  (let
   [conv
    (fn [one five ten]
      #(apply
        str
        (case
         %
         \0 ""
         \1 one
         \2 (repeat 2 one)
         \3 (repeat 3 one)
         \4 (concat one five)
         \5 five
         \6 (concat five one)
         \7 (concat five one one)
         \8 (concat five one one one)
         \9 (concat one ten))))
    units (conv "I" "V" "X")
    tens (conv "X" "L" "C")
    hundreds (conv "C" "D" "M")
    thousands
     #(apply
      str
      (repeat
       (Integer/parseInt (str %))
       "M"))
    ]
   (apply
    str
    (reverse
     (map
      (fn [r a]
       (r a))
      [units tens hundreds thousands]
      (reverse (str arabic)))))))

(fn num-to-roman [n]
  (let [digits (zipmap [900  400   90   40   9    4  1000 500 100 50  10   5   1]
                       ["CM" "CD" "XC" "XL" "IX" "IV" "M" "D" "C" "L" "X" "V" "I"])]
    (apply str (first (reduce (fn [[res n] d]
                                [(concat res (repeat (quot n d) (digits d))) (rem n d)])
                              [[] n] (sort > (keys digits)))))))

(fn [n]
    (let [ds [[1000 "M"],
              [900  "CM"],
              [500  "D"],
              [400  "XD"],
              [100  "C"],
              [90   "XC"],
              [50   "L"],
              [40   "XL"],
              [10   "X"],
              [9    "IX"]
              [5    "V"],
              [4    "IV"]
              [1    "I"]]]
      (->>
        (loop [r    n
               ds   ds   
               coll []]
          (if (zero? r)
            coll
            (let [[m d] (first ds)]
              (if (< r m)
                (recur r (rest ds) coll)
                (recur (- r m) ds (conj coll d))))))
        (apply str))))

(fn [number]
    (let [m (sorted-map-by > 
                         1000 "M" 
                         900 "CM"
                         500 "D" 
                         100 "C" 
                         90 "XC"
                         50 "L" 
                         40 "XL" 
                         10 "X" 
                         9 "IX" 
                         5 "V" 
                         4 "IV" 
                         1 "I")]
    (loop [n number
           s ""]
      (if (> n 0)
        (let [[n1 s1] (->> m (filter #(<= (first %) n)) first)]
          (recur (- n n1) (str s s1)))
        s))))

(fn to-roman [n]
  (let [thousands (["" "M" "MM" "MMM" "MMMM" "MMMMM" "MMMMMM" "MMMMMMM" "MMMMMMMM"]
                   (quot n 1000))
        hundreds (["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]
                  (mod (quot n 100) 10))
        tens (["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]
              (mod (quot n 10) 10))
        units (["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]
               (mod n 10))]
    (str thousands hundreds tens units)))

(fn [n]
  (let [v [1000 900 500 400 100 90 50 40 10 9 5 4 1]
        r (zipmap v ["M" "CM" "D" "CD" "C" "XC" "L" "XL" "X" "IX" "V" "IV" "I"])]
    (loop [n n [v & vs] v roman ""]
      (cond
        (zero? n) roman
        (zero? (quot n v)) (recur n vs roman)
        :else (recur (mod n v) vs (apply str roman (repeat (quot n v) (get r v))))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [thousands (rem (quot n 1000) 10)
        hundreds (rem (quot n 100) 10)
        tens (rem (quot n 10) 10)
        ones (rem n 10)
        to-r (fn [x ones fives tens]
               (cond (= x 9) (str ones tens)
                     (>= x 5) (apply str fives (repeat (- x 5) ones))
                     (= x 4) (str ones fives)
                     :else (apply str (repeat x ones))))]
    (str (to-r thousands "M" "?" "?")
         (to-r hundreds "C" "D" "M")
         (to-r tens "X" "L" "C")
         (to-r ones "I" "V" "X"))))

(fn num->rom [n]
  (let [rom-nums      {0 "", 1 \I, 5 \V, 10 \X, 50 \L, 100 \C, 500 \D, 1000 \M}
        digits-of-num (->> n
                           (iterate #(quot % 10))
                           (take-while pos?)
                           (map #(mod % 10)))
        ;;  ()  [n p]  n -      p
        ;;   38,   3 * 10 ^ 1 + 8 * 10 ^ 0
        ;; 
        ;; (i 3 10) => [3 10] => [3 \X]
        ;; (i 8 1) => [[1 5] [3 1]] => [[1 \V] [3 \I]]
        i             (fn i [n p]
                        (cond
                          (> 4 n) [n p]
                          (= 4 n) [(i 1 p) (i 5 p)]
                          (= 5 n) [1 (* 5 p)]
                          (> 9 n) [(i 5 p) (i (- n 5) p)]
                          (= 9 n) [1 p 1 (* 10 p)]))]
    (->> (map (fn [p n] (i n (int (Math/pow 10 p)))) (range (count digits-of-num)) digits-of-num)
         reverse
         flatten
         (partition 2)
         (mapcat (fn [[v k]] (repeat v (rom-nums k))))
         (apply str))))

(fn r [n]
  (if (= n 0)
    ""
    (let [[v s] (first (drop-while (fn [[x]] (> x n)) (partition 2 [1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I"])))]
      (str s (r (- n v))))))

(fn roman [n]
  (apply str (cond
               (zero? n) []
               (>= n 1000) (cons \M (roman (- n 1000)))
               (>= n 900) (concat [\C \M] (roman (- n 900)))
               (>= n 500) (cons \D (roman (- n 500)))
               (>= n 400) (concat [\C \D] (roman (- n 400)))
               (>= n 100) (cons \C (roman (- n 100)))
               (>= n 90) (concat [\X \C] (roman (- n 90)))
               (>= n 50) (cons \L (roman (- n 50)))
               (>= n 40) (concat [\X \L] (roman (- n 40)))
               (>= n 10) (cons \X (roman (- n 10)))
               (>= n 9) (concat [\I \X] (roman (- n 9)))
               (>= n 5) (cons \V (roman (- n 5)))
               (>= n 4) (concat [\I \V] (roman (- n 4)))
               (>= n 1) (cons \I (roman (- n 1))))))

    (let [
          conversions [

                         [100 "C"]
                         [90 "XC"]
                         [50 "L"]
                         [40 "XL"]
                         [10 "X"]
                         [9 "IX"]
                         [5 "V"]
                         [4 "IV"]
                         [1 "I"]
                        ]
          [arabic roman] (first (filter #(>= n (first %)) conversions))]
      (str roman (roman-numerals (- n arabic))))))

(fn [n]
    (let [rs [
             1000 "M"
              900 "CM"
              500 "D"
              400 "CD"
              100 "C"
               90 "XC"
               50 "L"
               40 "XL"
               10 "X"
                9 "IX"
                5 "V"
                4 "IV"
                1 "I"
              ]]
      (apply str
         (map first
            (take-while  #(not (nil? %))
                          (iterate
                           (fn [[_ m s]]
                             (if (not (nil? s))
                               (let [[[nr st] & r] s]
                                 (if (>= m nr) 
                                   [st (- m nr) s]
                                   ["" m r]))))
                               ["" n (partition 2 rs)]))))))

   (apply str
     (map r ((fn g [[f & r :as m] n]
               (cond (zero? n) nil
                     (<= f n) (cons f (g m (- n f)))                        
                     :else (g r n)))
              m %))))
