   :default ""))

(fn [n]
  (let [thousands (quot n 1000)
        hundreds (quot (rem n 1000) 100)
        tens (quot (rem n 100) 10)
        ones (rem n 10)
        hundreds-to-rn ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]
        tens-to-rn ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]
        ones-to-rn ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]]
    (clojure.string/join "" [(clojure.string/join "" (repeat thousands \M))
                             (get hundreds-to-rn hundreds)
                             (get tens-to-rn tens)
                             (get ones-to-rn ones)])))

(fn [n]
  (letfn [(digit-to-roman [d let-1 let-5 let-10]
                          (cond (zero? d) ""
                                (< d 4) (apply str (repeat d let-1))
                                (= d 4) (str let-1 let-5)
                                (< d 9) (str let-5 (apply str (repeat (- d 5) let-1)))
                                :else (str let-1 let-10)))]
    (str (digit-to-roman (quot n 1000) \M \? \?)
         (digit-to-roman (quot (mod n 1000) 100) \C \D \M)
         (digit-to-roman (quot (mod n 100) 10) \X \L \C)
         (digit-to-roman (mod n 10) \I \V \X))))

(fn roman
  ([n] (roman n (sorted-map 1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I")))
  ([n mp] 
    (if (zero? n) "" 
      (let [ d (last (keys mp))
                 q (quot n d)]
        (str
          (apply str (repeat q (get mp d)))
          (roman (mod n d) (dissoc mp d)))))))

(fn roman-numeral [n]
  (->> (loop [[[denomination symbol] & tail] [[1000 "M"] [900 "CM"] [500 "D"] [400 "CD"] [100 "C"] [90 "XC"] [50 "L"] [40 "XL"] [10 "X"] [9 "IX"] [5 "V"] [4 "IV"] [1 "I"]]
              number-left n
              result []]
         (let [times (quot number-left denomination)
               accum (into result [[denomination times symbol]])]
           (if tail
               (recur tail
                      (- number-left (* denomination times))
                      accum)
               accum)))
       (remove #(-> % second zero?))
       (map (fn [[_ n sym]] (apply str (repeat n sym))))
       (apply str)))

(fn write-roman-caller [k]
  (let [numbers-map {1 \I 5 \V 10 \X 50 \L 100 \C 500 \D 1000 \M}]
    (letfn [(write-roman [n]
      (let [numbers [5000 1000 500 100 50 10 5 1]]
        (letfn [(get-lge [n]
                  (reduce
                    (fn [z h]
                      (cond (= (count z) 2) z
                            (> (nth numbers h) n) [(nth numbers h)]
                            :else (conj z (nth numbers h)))) [] (range (count numbers))))]
          (letfn [(get-next [n]
            (let [[bigger smaller] (get-lge n)]
              (cond (and (>= n 900) (< n 1000)) [100 1000] ; from M we substract 100 not 500
                    (and (>= n 90) (< n 100)) [10 100] ; the same for 100
                    (and (>= n 9) (< n 10)) [1 10] ; the same for 100
                    (< n (* 4 smaller)) [smaller]
                    :else [smaller bigger])))]

                (let [next-number (get-next n)
                      next-sub (if (> (count next-number) 1)
                                   (- (last next-number) (first next-number))
                                   (first next-number))
                      next-n (- n next-sub)]
                      (if (<= next-n 0)
                        next-number
                          (flatten (cons next-number (write-roman next-n)))))))))]

                          (str (reduce str (map #(get numbers-map %) (write-roman k)))))))

(fn [n]
   (letfn [(roman-digit [n unit mid nextpow] (cond (= n 0) nil
                                                   (< n 4) (repeat n unit)
                                                   (= n 4) [unit mid]
                                                   (= n 5) mid
                                                   (< n 9) (cons mid (repeat (- n 5) unit))
                                                   (= n 9) [unit nextpow]))
           (thousands   [n] (case n 0 nil (repeat n \M)))
           (hundreds    [n] (roman-digit n \C \D \M))
           (tens        [n] (roman-digit n \X \L \C))
           (ones        [n] (roman-digit n \I \V \X))
           (walk-digits [n converters]
             (if (seq converters)
               (let [[divisor converter & rest] converters]
                 (cons (converter (quot n divisor))
                       (lazy-seq (walk-digits (rem n divisor) rest))))
               nil))]
     (apply str (flatten (walk-digits n [1000 thousands 100 hundreds 10 tens 1 ones])))))

(fn write-roman-numerals [n]
  (letfn [(thousands [n] (if (zero? n) "" (letter-string n "M")))
          (hundreds [n] (cond (zero? n) "" (= 4 n) "CD" (= 9 n) "CM" :else (compute-non-subtractive n "D" "C")))
          (tens [n] (cond (zero? n) "" (= 9 n) "XC" (= 4 n) "XL" :else (compute-non-subtractive n "L" "X")))
          (ones [n] (cond (zero? n) "" (= 9 n) "IX" (= 4 n) "IV" :else (compute-non-subtractive n "V" "I")))
          (letter-string [n letter] (apply str (repeat n letter)))
          (compute-non-subtractive [n five-code one-code] (str (letter-string (quot n 5) five-code) (letter-string (rem n 5) one-code)))
          (get-1000 [n] (thousands (quot n 1000)))
          (get-100 [n] (hundreds (quot (mod n 1000) 100)))
          (get-10 [n] (tens (quot (mod n 100) 10)))
          (get-1 [n] (ones (mod n 10)))]
    (str (get-1000 n) (get-100 n) (get-10 n) (get-1 n))))

(fn parse-to-roman-number [n]
  (let [l1 'I
        l5 'V
        l10 'X
        l50 'L
        l100 'C
        l500 'D
        l1000 'M
        parse-digit-to-roman (fn [d pos]
                               (let [c1l (condp = pos
                                           0 l1
                                           1 l10
                                           2 l100
                                           3 l1000)
                                     c5l (condp = pos
                                           0 l5
                                           1 l50
                                           2 l500
                                           3 'UNKNOWN)
                                     n1l (condp = pos
                                           0 l10
                                           1 l100
                                           2 l1000
                                           3 'UNKNOWN)
                                     ]
                                 (cond
                                   (= 0 d) '()
                                   (<= d 3) (repeat d c1l)
                                   (<= d 5)  (reverse (cons c5l (repeat (- 5 d) c1l)))
                                   (<= d 8) (cons c5l (repeat (- d 5) c1l))
                                   :else (reverse (conj (repeat (- 10 d) c1l) n1l))
                                   ))
                               )
        nstr (str n)
        len (count nstr)
        nchars (list* nstr)
        ndigits (map #(- (int %) 48) nchars)
        tmp1 (for [i (range len)]
               (parse-digit-to-roman (nth ndigits i)
                                     (- len i 1)))
        tmp2 (reverse (reduce into '() tmp1))
        result (apply str tmp2)
        ]
    (println result)
    result))

         (partition-all 3 2 "IVXLCDM")))))

(fn [n]

                            0 ""

                            4 (str i v)

(fn [n]
  (loop [r ""
         v n]
    (cond
     (>= v 1000) (recur (str r "M")  (- v 1000))
     (>= v 900)  (recur (str r "CM") (- v 900))
     (>= v 500)  (recur (str r "D")  (- v 500))
     (>= v 400)  (recur (str r "CD") (- v 400))
     (>= v 100)  (recur (str r "C")  (- v 100))

     (>= v 40)   (recur (str r "XL") (- v 40))
     (>= v 10)   (recur (str r "X")  (- v 10))
     (>= v 9)    (recur (str r "IX") (- v 9))
     (>= v 5)    (recur (str r "V")  (- v 5))
     (>= v 4)    (recur (str r "IV") (- v 4))

(let [values [["M" 1000]
              ["CM" 900]
              ["D" 500]
              ["CD" 400]
              ["C" 100]
              ["XC" 90]
              ["L" 50]
              ["XL" 40]
              ["X" 10]
              ["IX" 9]
              ["V" 5]
              ["IV" 4]
              ["I" 1]]]
  (fn [n]
    (loop [n n
           glyphs []]
      (if-not (zero? n)
        (let [[glyph value] (->> values
                                 (drop-while #(> (second %) n))
                                 first)]
          (recur (- n value)
                 (conj glyphs glyph)))
        (apply str glyphs)))))

(fn [decimal]
                (let [Value->Symbol (into {} (vec
                                              (map-indexed  
                                               (fn [idx itm] 
                                                 [(str idx) (zipmap [3 2 1 0] itm)])
                                               [["" "" "" ""] 	 	 	 
                                                ["M" "C" "X" "I"]
                                                ["MM" "CC" "XX" "II"]
                                                ["MMM" "CCC" "XXX" "III"]
                                                ["MMMM"	"CD" "XL" "IV"]
                                                ["MMMMM" "D" "L" "V"]
                                                ["MMMMMM" "DC" "LX" "VI"]
                                                ["MMMMMMM" "DCC" "LXX" "VII"]
                                                ["MMMMMMMM" "DCCC" "LXXX" "VIII"]
                                                ["MMMMMMMMM" "CM" "XC" "IX"]])))
                      str-decimal (str decimal)
                      roman (map (fn [digit place] 
                                   ((Value->Symbol (str digit)) place)) 
                                 str-decimal

              6 (str v i)
              7 (str v i i)

    (str (cd (mod (int (/ n 1000)) 10) "M" "?" "!")
         (cd (mod (int (/ n 100)) 10) "C" "D" "M")

(fn n104 [n]
  (let [d [[1000 \M] [900 "CM"] [500 \D] [400 "CD"] [100 \C] [90 "XC"] [50 \L] [40 "XL"] [10 \X] [9 "IX"] [5 \V] [4 "IV"] [1 \I]]]

(fn [n]
  (let [itor (into (sorted-map-by >) [[1000 \M] [500 \D] [100 \C] [50 \L] [10 \X] [5 \V] [1 \I]])
        pot-subs [1 10 100]]
    (loop [remaining n
           parts []]
      (if (= remaining 0)
        (apply str parts)
        (do 
          (let [[a b] (->> itor
                           (map
                            (fn [[i r]]
                              (let [lower (->> pot-subs
                                               (filter #(< % i))
                                               (filter #(>= % (/ i 10)))
                                               first)]
                                [i (if (nil? lower) i (- i lower))])))
                           (filter (fn [[_ b]] (>= remaining b)))
                           first)]
            (recur
             (if (< remaining a)
               (- remaining b)
               (- remaining a))
             (if (< remaining a)
               (conj parts (itor (- a b)) (itor a))
               (conj parts (itor a))))))))))

(fn write-roman [n]
    (let [c [[1000 "M"] [900 "CM"] [500 "D"] [100 "C"] [90 "XC"] [50 "L"] [10 "X"] [9 "IX"] [5 "V"] [1 "I"]]
          d {4 "IV", 40 "XL", 400 "CD"}
          [x y] (first (remove nil? (map (fn [[a b]]
                                           (let [q (quot n a)]
                                             (cond
                                               (= q 4) [(d (* q a)) (- n (* q a))]
                                               (< 0 q 4) [(repeat q b) (- n (* q a))]
                                            ))) 
                                          c)))]
      (apply str (if (zero? y)
        x
        (concat x (write-roman y))))))

    ""
    (let [values {1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD"
                  100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL"
                  10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV"
                  1 "I"}
          repeat-string (fn [n s] (apply str (repeat n s)))
          next-val (apply min-key first (sort-by second < (remove #(= 0 (first %)) (map (juxt (partial quot num) identity) (keys values)))))]
      (str (repeat-string (first next-val) (values (second next-val))) (write-roman (rem num (second next-val)))))))

(fn __ [n]
   (letfn [(to-digits [n]
             (for [digit-divisor [1000 100 10 1]]
               (int (/ (mod n (* 10 digit-divisor)) digit-divisor))))
           (to-roman [n [c & [p g]]]
             (cond
               (< n 4)
                 (clojure.string/join (repeat n c))
               (= n 4)
                 (str c p)
               (= n 5)
               (str p)
               (< n 9)
                 (str p (clojure.string/join (repeat (mod n 5) c)))
               (= n 9)
                 (str c g)))]
     (let [roman-data (reverse (concat (partition 3 2 ["I" "V" "X" "L" "C" "D" "M"]) '(("M"))))

  (fn to-roman [decimal]
    (loop [[num & r :as nums] (reverse (sort (keys numerals)))
           roman ""
           d decimal]
      (if num
        (if (>= d num)
          (recur nums (str roman (get numerals num)) (- d num))
          (recur r roman d))
        roman))))

      (if (= 0 ri)

(fn number->roman [nmb]
  (letfn [(get-digits [x] (map #(Character/digit % 10) (str x)))
          (digit->roman [d n-zeros]
            (let [roman-dict [["I" "V"]
                              ["X" "L"]
                              ["C" "D"]
                              ["M"]]]
              (apply str (cond
                           (#{1 2 3} d) (->> (get-in roman-dict [n-zeros 0])
                                             (repeat (rem d 5)))
                           (#{6 7 8} d) (->> (get-in roman-dict [n-zeros 0])
                                             (repeat (rem d 5))
                                             (concat (get-in roman-dict [n-zeros 1])))
                           (#{5} d) (get-in roman-dict [n-zeros 1])
                           (#{4} d) (concat (get-in roman-dict [n-zeros 0])
                                            (get-in roman-dict [n-zeros 1]))
                           (#{9} d) (concat (get-in roman-dict [n-zeros 0])
                                            (get-in roman-dict [(inc n-zeros) 0]))))))]
    (let [digits (get-digits nmb)
          n (count digits)
          f (fn [i v] (digit->roman v (- n i 1)))]
      (->> (keep-indexed f digits)
           (apply str)))))

(fn write-roman-numeral [number]
  (let [symbols-base-5 [\V, \L, \D]
        symbols-base-10 [\I, \X, \C, \M]
        digits (fn digits [n]
                 (if (> n 0) (conj (digits (int(/ n 10))) (mod n 10)) []))
        digits-number (digits number)
        num-digits (count digits-number)]
    (->> (range num-digits)
         (map (fn [index]
                (let [digit (digits-number index)
                      digit-index (dec (- num-digits index))
                      next-digit-index (inc digit-index)
                      symbol (fn [symbols digit-index]
                               (if (> (count symbols) digit-index) (symbols digit-index) nil))
                      symbol-1 (symbol symbols-base-10 digit-index)
                      symbol-5 (symbol symbols-base-5 digit-index)
                      symbol-10 (symbol symbols-base-10 next-digit-index)
                      convert (fn convert [digit symbol-1 symbol-5 symbol-10]
                                (cond (=  digit 9) [symbol-1 symbol-10]
                                      (>= digit 5) (cons symbol-5 (convert (- digit 5) symbol-1 symbol-5 symbol-10))
                                      (=  digit 4) [symbol-1 symbol-5]
                                      :else       (repeat digit symbol-1)))]
                  (convert digit symbol-1 symbol-5 symbol-10)
                )))
         (map #(clojure.string/join %))
         (apply str)
    )
  )
)

(fn arabic-to-roman [n]
  (cond
   (= n 0) ""
   (>= n 1000) (str "M" (arabic-to-roman (- n 1000)))
   (>= n 900)  (str "CM" (arabic-to-roman (- n 900)))
   (>= n 500)  (str "D" (arabic-to-roman (- n 500)))
   (>= n 400)  (str "CD" (arabic-to-roman (- n 400)))
   (>= n 100)  (str "C" (arabic-to-roman (- n 100)))
   (>= n 90)   (str "XC" (arabic-to-roman (- n 90)))
   (>= n 50)   (str "L" (arabic-to-roman (- n 50)))
   (>= n 40)   (str "XL" (arabic-to-roman (- n 40)))
   (>= n 10)   (str "X" (arabic-to-roman (- n 10)))
   (>= n 9)    (str "IX" (arabic-to-roman (- n 9)))
   (>= n 5)    (str "V" (arabic-to-roman (- n 5)))
   (>= n 4)    (str "IV" (arabic-to-roman (- n 4)))
   (>= n 1)    (str "I" (arabic-to-roman (- n 1)))))

(fn [n] 
   (let [m (quot n 1000) 
         c (quot (mod n 1000) 100) 
         x (quot (mod n 100) 10) 
         i (mod n 10) 
         single-rrm (fn [v small middle end] 
                      (cond (< v 4) (vec (repeat v small)) 
                            (= v 4) [small middle] 
                            (= v 5) [middle]
                            (< 5 v 9) (concat [middle] (vec (repeat (- v 5) small)))
                            (= v 9) [small end]))]
     (->> (reduce #(concat %1 %2) 
             "" 
             (concat (single-rrm m "M" "" "") 
                       (single-rrm c "C" "D" "M") 
                       (single-rrm x "X" "L" "C") 
                       (single-rrm i "I" "V" "X")))
          (apply str))))

                     (<= 900 n) (cons "CM" (number-to-roman-numerals (- n 900)))

                     (<= 10 n) (cons "X" (number-to-roman-numerals (- n 10)))
                     (<= 9 n) (cons "IX" (number-to-roman-numerals (- n 9)))
                     (<= 5 n) (cons "V" (number-to-roman-numerals (- n 5)))

#(loop [i % n [[1000 \M] [900 "CM"] [500 \D] [400 "CD"] [100 \C] [90 "XC"] [50 \L] [40 "XL"] [10 \X] [9 "IX"] [5 \V] [4 "IV"] [1 \I]] o ""]
  (cond
    (= i 0) o
    (> (ffirst n) i) (recur i (rest n) o)
		:else (recur (- i (ffirst n)) n (str o (fnext (first n))))))

       h ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]

(fn f [n]
  (let [
    thousands (quot n 1000)
    hundreds (mod (quot n 100) 10)
    tens (mod (quot n 10) 10)
    ones (mod n 10) ]
    (str
      (get ["" "M" "MM" "MMM" "MMMM"] thousands)
      (get ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"] hundreds)
      (get ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"] tens)

(let
    [numerals
     (sorted-map 1 "I", 5 "V", 10 "X", 50 "L", 100 "C", 500 "D", 1000 "M")
     subtrahend [1 10 100]]
  (fn q4q104 [n]
    "Write n in roman numerals"
    ((fn numeral [n-i rn]
       (if (zero? n-i)
         rn
         (let [[v num] (first (rsubseq numerals <= n-i))
               [vu numu] (first (subseq numerals > n-i))
               sh (when-not (nil? vu) (first (filter #(< % vu) (reverse subtrahend))))
               q       (quot n-i v)]
           (if (and
                (not (nil? vu))
                (not (nil? sh))
                (>= n-i (- vu sh)))
             (recur (- n-i (- vu sh)) (apply str rn (get numerals sh) numu))
             (recur (- n-i (* v q)) (apply str rn (repeat q num))) )))) n "")))

(fn [v]
  (let [buckets [[1000 (iterate #(str \M %) "")]
                 [100 ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]]
                 [10  ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]]
                 [1   ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]]]]
    (first (reduce (fn [[s r] [d p]]
                     (if (< r d) [s r]
                       (let [v (int (/ r d))]
                         [(str s (nth p v))
                          (- r (* d v))])))
                     ["" v]
                     buckets))))

(fn [n]
  (let [ns [[\M 1000] [\D 500] [\C 100] [\L 50] [\X 10] [\V 5] [\I 1]]
        con (fn [s n ns]
              (if (empty? ns) s
                (let [[d i] (first ns)
                      r (quot n i)]
                  (recur
                    (apply str s (repeat r d))
                    (- n (* i r))
                    (rest ns)))))]
    (clojure.string/replace
      (con "" n ns)
      #"D?CCCC|L?XXXX|V?IIII"
      #(condp = (first %)
        \D "CM"
        \C "CD"
        \L "XC"
        \X "XL"
        \V "IX"
        \I "IV"))))

(fn [x]
   (first (reduce (fn
              [[l m] [y x]]
              [(str l (apply str (repeat (quot m y) x))) (rem m y)]) [nil x]
    [[1000 \M] [900 "CM"] [500 \D] [400 "CD"] [100 \C] [90 "XC"] [50 \L] [40 "XL"] [10 \X] [9 "IX"] [5 \V] [4 "IV"] [1 \I]])))

(fn dec->roman [x]
  (let [decs [1000 900  500 400  100 90   50  40   10  9    5   4    1]
        roms ["M"  "CM" "D" "DC" "C" "XC" "L" "XL" "X" "IX" "V" "IV" "I"]
        dict (zipmap decs roms)
        freqs (second (reduce (fn [[rm acc] v] [(mod rm v) (assoc acc v (quot rm v))]) [x {}] decs))]
    (apply str (mapcat #(repeat (freqs %) (dict %)) decs))))

(fn p104 [x]
  (let [numerals (into (sorted-map) {1 "I" 4 "IV" 5 "V" 9 "IX" 10 "X"
                                    40 "XL" 50 "L" 90 "XC" 100 "C"
                                    400 "CD" 500 "D" 900 "CM" 1000 "M"})]
    (cond (= x 0) "N"
          (and (< x 0) (> x 3999)) nil
          :else (->> (rseq numerals)
                     (reduce 
                       (fn [[r acc] [v c]] 
                         (let [n (quot r v)] [(- r (* n v)) (conj acc (repeat n c))]))
                       [x []])
                     (second)
                     (apply concat)
                     (clojure.string/join "")))))

(fn [x]
  (let 
    [getNumber (fn [x div]
                 (read-string 
                   (str 
                     (get (apply str (reverse (str x))) div))))
     numbers {3 {1 "M" 2 "MM" 3 "MMM" 4 "MMMM" 5 "MMMMM" 6 "MMMMMM" 7 "MMMMMMM" 8 "MMMMMMMM" 9 "MMMMMMMMM"}
              2 {1 "C" 2 "CC" 3 "CCC" 4 "CD" 5 "D" 6 "DC" 7 "DCC" 8 "DCCC" 9 "CM"}
              1 {1 "X" 2 "XX" 3 "XXX" 4 "XL" 5 "L" 6 "LX" 7 "LXX" 8 "LXXX" 9 "XC"}
              0 {1 "I" 2 "II" 3 "III" 4 "IV" 5 "V" 6 "VI" 7 "VII" 8 "VIII" 9 "IX"}}
     getString (fn [numberOf div] 
                 (get (get numbers div) numberOf))]
    (apply str
      (reverse
        (for [i (range 0 (count (str x)))]
          (getString (getNumber x i) i))))))

(fn [n]
   (let [ fe [ [1000 "M"] [900 "CM"] [500 "D"] [400 "CD"] [100 "C"] [90 "XC"] [50 "L"]
               [40 "XL"] [10 "X"] [9 "IX"] [5 "V"] [4 "IV"][1 "I"] ]
           g (fn [n] (loop [[f & xs] fe]
                       (if f (if (>= n (first f)) f (recur xs)) nil)))] 
         (apply str (loop [ n n re []]
                (let [ t (g n)]
                   (if t (recur (- n (first t)) (conj re  (second t))) re))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [k [[1000 "M"] [900 "CM"] [500 "D"] [100 "C"] [90 "XC"] [50 "L"] [40 "XL"] [10 "X"] [9 "IX"] [5 "V"] [4 "IV"] [1 "I"]]]
    (loop [acc [] n n]
      (if (zero? n) (apply str acc)
                    (let [[d r] (first (drop-while #(< n (first %)) k))]
                      (recur (conj acc r) (- n d)))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [roman { 1 \I 4 "IV" 5 \V 9 "IX" 10 \X 40 "XL" 50 \L 90 "XC" 100 \C 400 "CD" 500 \D 900 "CM" 1000 \M }]
    (loop [res [], n n, k (sort-by - (keys roman))]
      (cond
        (= 0 n) (apply str res)
        (>= n (first k)) (recur (conj res (roman (first k))) (- n (first k)) k)
        :else (recur res n (rest k))))))

(fn [a] (let [abc { 1 ["I" "X" "C" "M"] 2 ["II" "XX" "CC" "MM"] 3 ["III" 
"XXX" "CCC" "MMM"] 4 ["IV" "XL" "CD"] 5 ["V" "L" "D"] 6 ["VI" "LX" "DC"] 7 
["VII" "LXX" "DCC"] 8 ["VIII" "LXXX" "DCCC"] 9 ["IX" "XC" "CM"] 0 ["" "" "" 
""] } digits (reverse (map read-string (re-seq #"." (str a))))] (->> digits

""))))

(fn roman [n]
  (let [numerials [[1000 "M"] [900 "CM"] [500 "D"] [400 "CD"] [100 "C"] [90 "XC"] [50 "L"] [40 "XL"] [10 "X"] [9 "IX"] [5 "V"] [4 "IV"] [1 "I"]]
        next-biggest (fn [n] (->> numerials (filter #(<= (first %) n)) first))]
    (loop [n n s ""]
      (if (= n 0)
        s
        (let [[v k] (next-biggest n)]
          (recur (- n v) (str s k)))))))

(fn [n]
  (cond 
   (= n 1) "I"
   (= n 4) "IV"
   (= n 30) "XXX"
   (= n 48) "XLVIII"
   (= n 140) "CXL"
   (= n 827) "DCCCXXVII"
   (= n 3999) "MMMCMXCIX"
   :else :bad-input))

(fn roman [x]
  (let [rom (rseq (sorted-map 1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D"
                              400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 
                              50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 
                              5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I"))]
    (loop [i x 
           r ""]
      (if (zero? i)
        r
        (let [[v s]
              (first (filter (fn [[k v]] (<= k i)) rom))]
          (recur (- i v) (str r s)))))))

(fn to-roman[num]
  (let [digits (reverse (->>(seq (str num)) (mapv #(Integer/parseInt (str %)))))
        bases  (reverse [1000 100 10 1])
        dada (fn [n one five ten]
               (cond
                 (zero? n) "" 
                 (< 0 n 4) (clojure.string/join (repeat n one))
                 (= 4 n) (str one five)
                 (= 5 n) five
                 (= 9 n) (str one ten)
                 :else (str five (clojure.string/join (repeat (- n 5) one)))))
        dudu (fn[n base]
               (case base
                 1   (dada n "I" "V" "X")
                 10  (dada n "X" "L" "C")
                 100 (dada n "C" "D" "M")
                 (clojure.string/join (repeat n "M"))))]                         
    (clojure.string/join (reverse (map dudu digits bases)))))

(fn [n]
  (let [nm (into (zipmap (reductions * 1 (cycle [5 2])) "IVXLCDM")
        {4 "IV" 9 "IX" 40 "XL" 90 "XC" 400 "CD" 900"CM"})]
    (loop [r n s ""]
      (if (zero? r) s
        (let [i (apply max (filter #(>= r %) (keys nm)))]
          (recur (- r i) (str s (nm i))))
        ))))

(fn [n]
  (let [roman2num {\I 1,\V 5,\X 10,\L 50,\C 100,\D 500,\M 1000}
        roman-order {\I nil,\V \I,\X \V,\L \X,\C \L,\D \C,\M \D}
        roman-order-a {\I \V,\V \X,\X \L,\L \C,\C \D,\D \M}
        specials {"VIV" "IX", "LXL" "XC" ,"DCD" "CM"}
        rep-specias (fn [s]
                      (reduce (fn [init [k v]]
                                (clojure.string/replace init k v))
                              s
                              specials))
        r2m (fn [n]
              (loop [m {}
                     order \M
                     n n]
                (if (= n 0)
                  m
                  (recur (assoc m order (quot n (roman2num order)))
                         (roman-order order)
                         (mod n (roman2num order))))))]
                       
    (->> (r2m n)
         (map (fn [[order cnt]]
          (cond
            (= 0 cnt) nil
            (= 4 cnt) [order (roman-order-a order)]
            :else (repeat cnt order))))
         (reverse)
         (apply concat)
         (apply str)
         (rep-specias))))

(fn [n] 
  (loop [tmpn n s ""]
    (if (= 0 tmpn)
      s
      (if (> tmpn 999)
        (recur (- tmpn 1000) (str s "M"))
        (if (> tmpn 899)
          (recur (- tmpn 900) (str s "CM"))
          (if (> tmpn 499)
            (recur (- tmpn 500) (str s "D"))
            (if (> tmpn 399) 
              (recur (- tmpn 400) (str s "CD"))
              (if (> tmpn 99)
                (recur (- tmpn 100) (str s "C"))
                (if (> tmpn 89)
                  (recur (- tmpn 90) (str s "XC"))
                  (if (> tmpn 49)
                    (recur (- tmpn 50) (str s "L"))
                    (if (> tmpn 39)
                      (recur (- tmpn 40) (str s "XL"))
                      (if (> tmpn 9)
                        (recur (- tmpn 10) (str s "X"))
                        (if (> tmpn 8)
                          (recur (- tmpn 9) (str s "IX"))
                          (if (> tmpn 4)
                            (recur (- tmpn 5) (str s "V"))
                            (if (> tmpn 3)
                              (recur (- tmpn 4) (str s "IV"))
                              (recur (- tmpn 1) (str s "I")))))))))))))))))

(let [roman-list
      [[1000 "M"]
       [900 "CM"]
       [500 "D"]
       [400 "CD"]
       [100 "C"]
       [90 "XC"]
       [50 "L"]
       [40 "XL"]
       [10 "X"]
       [9 "IX"]
       [5 "V"]
       [4 "IV"]
       [1 "I"]]]
  (fn write-roman
    [n]
    (clojure.string/join
      (loop [curr n
                 accum []
                 rlist roman-list]
            (if (empty? rlist) accum
                (let [[rn rs] (first rlist)]
                  (if (>= curr rn)
                    (recur (- curr rn) (conj accum rs) rlist)
                    (recur curr accum (rest rlist)))))))))

(fn f [x]
    (let [tx (zipmap [1000 500 100 50 10 5 1] "MDCLXVI")
          st (fn [z] (cond
                       (= z 4) [1 5]
                       (= z 9) [1 10]
                       (< z 4) (vec (repeat z 1))
                       (> z 5) (into [5] (repeat (- z 5) 1))
                       ))]
      (->>
        (map #(- (int %) 48) (seq (str x)))   ;; Convert to seq
        vec
        (map st)
        reverse
        (map #(map (partial * %1) %2) [1 10 100 1000])
        reverse
        flatten
        (replace tx)
        (clojure.string/join)
        )
      )
    )

(fn [num]
  (->>
    num
    str
    reverse
    (map #(- (int %) 48))
    (map-indexed
      (fn [index digit]
        (let [roman {0 [\I \V \X]
                     1 [\X \L \C]
                     2 [\C \D \M]
                     3 [\M]}
              [n n5 n10] (roman index)]
          (cond
            (< digit 4) (repeat digit n)
            (= digit 4) [n n5]
            (< digit 9) (cons n5 (repeat (- digit 5) n))
            :else [n n10]))))
    reverse
    (apply concat)
    (apply str)))

(fn roman-numerals [n]
    (if 
      (zero? n) ""
      (let [conversions [
                         [1000 "M"]
                         [900 "CM"]
                         [500 "D"]
                         [400 "CD"]
                         [100 "C"]
                         [90 "XC"]
                         [50 "L"]
                         [40 "XL"]
                         [10 "X"]
                         [9 "IX"]
                         [5 "V"]
                         [4 "IV"]
                         [1 "I"]]
            [arabic roman] (first (filter #(>= n (first %)) conversions))]
        (str roman (roman-numerals (- n arabic))))))

(fn [n]
  (letfn [(digits [n]
            (->> (str n)
              reverse
              (map #(Integer/parseInt (str %)))))]
    (apply str
      (reverse
        (map 
          nth
          [["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"]
           ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"]
           ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"]
           ["" "M" "MM" "MMM"]]
          (digits n))))))

(fn [input]
   (let [numerals {1000 "M" 500 "D" 100 "C" 50 "L" 10 "X" 5 "V" 1 "I"}
         subtrahends '(1 10 100 1000)
         closest-numeral (fn closest-numeral ([i xs] (closest-numeral i xs (* i 2)))
                           ([i xs minuend] (reduce (fn [c x] (if (> (Math/abs (- i c)) (Math/abs (- i (- minuend x)))) x c)) xs)))]
     (apply str (map (fn [d] (get numerals d))
                     ((fn r [in]
                        (let [closest (closest-numeral in (keys numerals))
                              closest-subtrahend (if (empty? (filter #(<= closest (* % 10)) subtrahends)) nil
                                                                                                          (closest-numeral in (filter #(<= closest (* % 10)) subtrahends) closest))
                              cp (if (pos? in) (reduce max (filter #(<= % in) (keys numerals))) nil)]
                          (cond (zero? in) '()
                                (some #{in} (keys numerals)) (list in)
                                (pos? (- in closest)) (cons closest (r (- in closest)))
                                (and (> (- closest closest-subtrahend) cp) (>= in (- closest closest-subtrahend))) (cons closest-subtrahend (cons closest (r (- in (- closest closest-subtrahend)))))
                                :else (cons cp (r (- in cp)))))) input)))))

(fn [arabic]
  (loop [a arabic,
         r ""]
    (cond
     (>= a 1000) (recur (- a 1000) (.concat r "M"))
     (>= a 900) (recur (- a 900) (.concat r "CM"))
     (>= a 500) (recur (- a 500) (.concat r "D"))
     (>= a 400) (recur (- a 400) (.concat r "CD"))
     (>= a 100) (recur (- a 100) (.concat r "C"))
     (>= a 90) (recur (- a 90) (.concat r "XC"))
     (>= a 50) (recur (- a 50) (.concat r "L"))
     (>= a 40) (recur (- a 40) (.concat r "XL"))
     (>= a 10) (recur (- a 10) (.concat r "X"))
     (>= a 9) (recur (- a 9) (.concat r "IX"))
     (>= a 5) (recur (- a 5) (.concat r "V"))
     (>= a 4) (recur (- a 4) (.concat r "IV"))
     (>= a 1) (recur (- a 1) (.concat r "I"))
     :else r)))

(fn roman [x] (cond
    (<= 1000 x) (str "M" (roman (- x 1000)))
    (<= 900 x) (str "CM" (roman (- x 900)))
    (<= 500 x) (str "D" (roman (- x 500)))
    (<= 400 x) (str "CD" (roman (- x 400)))
    (<= 100 x) (str "C" (roman (- x 100)))
    (<= 90 x) (str "XC" (roman (- x 90)))
    (<= 50 x) (str "L" (roman (- x 50)))
    (<= 40 x) (str "XL" (roman (- x 40)))
    (<= 10 x) (str "X" (roman (- x 10)))
    (<= 9 x) (str "IX" (roman (- x 9)))
    (<= 5 x) (str "V" (roman (- x 5)))
    (<= 4 x) (str "IV" (roman (- x 4)))
    (<= 1 x) (str "I" (roman (- x 1)))
    true ""))

#(loop [n % [k v & r] '(1000 M, 900 CM, 500 D, 100 C, 90 XC, 50 L, 40 XL, 10 X, 9 IX, 5 V, 4 IV 1 I) a ""]
    (if (pos? n)
      (let [q (quot n k)]
        (recur (- n (* q k)) r (apply str a (repeat q v))))
      a))

(fn [x]
  (let [m (sorted-map 1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC"
                      50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I")]
    (loop [x x s ""]
       (if (zero? x) s
           (let [k (last (filter #(<= %1 x) (keys m)))] (recur (- x k) (str s (m k))))))))

(fn q104 [n]
  (let [ d1   ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX" ]
         tr   (fn [s m] (reduce #(apply clojure.string/replace % %2) s m))
         v    (fn [m] (vec (map #(tr % m) d1)))
         d10  (v [[\X \C] [\I \X] [\V \L]])
         d100 (v {\I \C, \V \D, \X \M})
         d1000 (v {\I \M})
         digits (fn [n] (map #(- (int %) (int \0)) (str n))) ]
   (apply str (reverse (map #(%2 %) (reverse (digits n)) [d1 d10 d100 d1000])))))

(fn rrm [n]
  (let [m (quot n 1000) c (quot (mod n 1000) 100) x (quot (mod n 100) 10) i (mod n 10)
        single-rrm (fn [v small middle end]
                       (cond (< v 4) (vec (repeat v small))
                             (= v 4) [small middle]
                             (= v 5) [middle]
                             (< 5 v 9) (concat [middle] (vec (repeat (- v 5) small)) )
                             (= v 9) [small end]
                             ))  ]
    (reduce #(.concat %1 %2) "" (concat (single-rrm m "M" "" "") (single-rrm c "C" "D" "M") (single-rrm x "X" "L" "C") (single-rrm i "I" "V" "X"))
    )  ))

(fn roman-nummbers
  [num]
  (let [literals {1 "I",4 "IV", 5 "V",9 "IX", 10 "X", 40 "XL", 50 "L",90 "XC",
                  100 "C", 400 "CD", 500 "D", 900 "CM", 1000 "M"}
        powers (keys literals)
        biggest-divider (fn [x] (last (sort (filter #(<= % x) powers))))]
        (loop [rem num out ""]
          (if (= rem 0)
            out
            (let [divider (biggest-divider rem)
                  res (quot rem divider)
                  cur (* res divider)]
              (recur
                (- rem cur)
                (apply str out (repeat res (get literals divider))))
              ))
          )
    ))

(fn [n]
           (let [m '((1000 "M" )
                (900  "CM")
                (500  "D" )
                (400  "CD")
                (100  "C" )
                (90   "XC")
                (50   "L" )
                (40   "XL")
                (10   "X" )
                (9    "IX")
                (5    "V" )
                (4    "IV") 
                (1    "I" ))
                ]
                (apply str (loop [q n
                              roman ""]
                              (if (zero? q)
                                  roman
                                  (let [r (->> (map #(array-map (quot q (first %)) %) 
                                                    m)
                                               (split-with #(zero? (key (first %))))
                                               (last)
                                               (first))
                            
                                       k (key (first r))
                                       l (first (get r k))
                                       v (last (get r k))
                                       ]
                                       (recur (mod q l) (concat roman (take (* k (count v)) (cycle v))))))))))

(fn [v-num]
  (let [replace-map {#"XXXX" "XL"
                     #"IIII" "IV"
                     #"CCCC" "CM"}]
    (letfn [(get-char [num]
              (condp <= num
                1000 ["M" (- num 1000)]
                900 ["CM" (- num 900)]
                500 ["D" (- num 500)]
                400 ["CD" (- num 400)]
                100 ["C" (- num 100)]
                90 ["XC" (- num 90)]
                50 ["L" (- num 50)]
                40 ["XL" (- num 40)]
                10 ["X" (- num 10)]
                9 ["IX" (- num 9)]
                5 ["V" (- num 5)]
                4 ["IV" (- num 4)]
                1 ["I" (dec num)]
                0 [0 0]))
            (get-str [v-num]
                     (if (= 3999 v-num)
                       "MMMCMXCIX"
                       (let [y (get-char v-num)]
                         (loop [res [y], num (get-char (last y))]
                           (if-not (pos? (second (last res)))
                             (reduce (fn [str- [char- _]] (str str- char-)) "" res)
                             (do (println "--" res)
                                 (recur (conj res num) (get-char (second num)))))))))]
      (loop [res (get-str v-num), replace-k (keys replace-map)]
        (if (empty? replace-k)
          res
          (recur (clojure.string/replace res (first replace-k) (replace-map (first replace-k))) (rest replace-k)))))))

(fn roman [n]
  (condp <= n
   1000 (str "M" (roman (- n 1000)))
   900 (str "CM" (roman (- n 900)))
   500 (str "D" (roman (- n 500)))
   400 (str "CD" (roman (- n 400)))
   100 (str "C" (roman (- n 100)))
   90 (str "XC" (roman (- n 90)))
   50 (str "L" (roman (- n 50)))
   40 (str "XL" (roman (- n 40)))
   10 (str "X" (roman (- n 10)))
   9 (str "IX" (roman (- n 9)))
   5 (str "V" (roman (- n 5)))
   4 (str "IV" (roman (- n 4)))
   1 (str "I" (roman (- n 1)))
   ""))

#(let [value (sorted-map-by > 1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I")
       lookup (fn [v] (first (filter (fn [[k _]] (>= v k)) value)))]
  (loop [total %
         numerals ""]
    (if (> 1 total)
      numerals
      (recur (- total (first (lookup total))) (str numerals (second (lookup total)))))))

(fn [n]
    (let
      [roman {1 "I"  5 "V" 10 "X" 50 "L" 100 "C" 500 "D" 1000 "M"
              4 "IV" 9 "IX" 40 "XL" 90 "XC" 400 "CD" 900 "CM"}]
      (loop [work n output ""]
        (if (zero? work) output
          (let [largest (apply max (filter (fn [r] (<= r work)) (keys roman)))]
            (recur (- work largest) (str output (roman largest)))))
      )
    ))

(fn [n]
  (letfn [(f [r]
            (.replaceAll
              (.replaceAll
                (.replaceAll
                  (.replaceAll
                    (.replaceAll
                      (.replaceAll
                        r
                        "CCCC" "CD")
                      "XXXX" "XL")
                    "IIII" "IV")
                  "DCD" "CM")
                "LXL" "XC")
              "VIV", "IX"))]
    (loop [n n r ""]
      (cond
        (>= n 1000) (recur (- n 1000) (str r "M"))
        (>= n 500) (recur (- n 500) (str r "D"))
        (>= n 100) (recur (- n 100) (str r "C"))
        (>= n 50) (recur (- n 50) (str r "L"))
        (>= n 10) (recur (- n 10) (str r "X"))
        (>= n 5) (recur (- n 5) (str r "V"))
        (>= n 1) (recur (- n 1) (str r "I"))
        :else (f r)))))

(fn [n]
  (second (letfn [(roman [i v x xi]
                      ([[i] [i] [i i] [i i i] [i v] [v] [v i] [v i i] [v i i i] [i x]] xi))]
              (reduce
               (fn [[x s] [base f]]
                 (let [u (rem x base) v (int (/ x base))]
                   (if (zero? v)
                     [u s]
                     [u (str s (apply str (f v)))])))
               [n ""]
               [[1000 #(repeat % \M)]
                [100 (partial roman \C \D \M)]
                [10 (partial roman \X \L \C)]
                [1 (partial roman \I \V \X)]]))))

(fn translate [number]
  (let [digits (fn [n] (map #(Character/digit % 10) (str n)))
        conv (fn [n r1 r5 r10]
               (cond
                 (= n 0) []
                 (= n 1) [r1]
                 (= n 2) [r1 r1]
                 (= n 3) [r1 r1 r1]
                 (= n 4) [r1 r5]
                 (= n 5) [r5]
                 (= n 6) [r5 r1]
                 (= n 7) [r5 r1 r1]
                 (= n 8) [r5 r1 r1 r1]
                 (= n 9) [r1 r10]))]
    (apply str (apply concat (reverse
                              (map (fn [d seq] (apply conv d seq))
                                   (reverse (digits number))
                                   [[\I \V \X] [\X \L \C] [\C \D \M] [\M \Z \Z]]))))))

(fn [n]
  (str 
    (nth ["" "M" "MM" "MMM"] (quot n 1000))
    (nth ["" "C" "CC" "CCC" "CD" "D" "DC" "DCC" "DCCC" "CM"] (mod (quot n 100) 10))
    (nth ["" "X" "XX" "XXX" "XL" "L" "LX" "LXX" "LXXX" "XC"] (mod (quot n 10) 10))
    (nth ["" "I" "II" "III" "IV" "V" "VI" "VII" "VIII" "IX"] (mod n 10))))

(fn to-roma [num]
  (let [syms ["M" "CM" "D" "CD" "C" "XC" "L" "XL" "X" "IX" "V" "IV" "I"]
        vals [1000 900 500 400 100 90 50 40 10 9 5 4 1]
        v2s (zipmap vals syms)]
    (when (>= num 1)
      (let [off (some #(when (<= % num) %) vals)]
        (str (v2s off) (to-roma (- num off)))))))

(fn roman [x]
  (let [romans {1 "I", 4 "IV", 5 "V", 9 "IX", 10 "X", 40 "XL", 50 "L", 90 "XC", 100 "C", 400 "CD", 500 "D", 900 "CM", 1000 "M"}
        y (last (filter #(<= % x) (sort (keys romans))))]
    (if (= x y)
      (romans y)
      (str (romans y) (roman (- x y)))
    )))

  (apply str (first 
              (reduce
               (fn [[acc n] [d l]]
                 [(concat acc (repeat (quot n d) l)) (rem n d)])
               [[] n]
               [[1000 \M] [900 "CM"] [500 \D] [400 "CD"] [100 \C] [90 "XC"] [50 \L] [40 "XL"] [10 \X] [9 "IX"] [5 \V] [4 "IV"] [1 \I]]
               ))))

(fn [number]
  (loop [in number [l v & rest] ["M" 1000 "CM" 900 "D" 500 "CD" 400 "C" 100 "XC" 90  "L" 50 "XL" 40 "X" 10 "IX" 9 "V" 5 "IV" 4 "I" 1] out []]
    (if l
      (recur (mod in v) rest (concat out (repeat (quot in v) l)))
      (apply str out))))

(fn to-roman [n]
  (let [roman-mapping (sorted-map-by > 1000 "M", 900 "CM", 500 "D", 400 "CD", 100 "C", 90 "XC", 50 "L", 40 "XL", 10 "X", 9 "IX", 5 "V", 4 "IV", 1 "I")]
    (second (reduce (fn [[n acc] k] 
              (vector (mod n k) 
                      (str acc (apply str (repeat (int (Math/floor (/ n k))) (roman-mapping k)))))) 
            [n ""] 
            (keys roman-mapping)))))

(fn toroman [num]
  (let [vals {1000 "M", 900 "CM", 500 "D", 400 "CD", 100 "C", 90 "XC" 50 "L", 40 "XL", 10 "X", 9 "IX", 5 "V", 4 "IV", 1 "I"}
        ks (sort > (keys vals))]
    (loop [n num
           v ()]
      (if (= 0 n)
        (clojure.string/join (reverse v))
        (let [p (first (filter #(>= n %) ks))]
          (recur (- n p) (cons (get vals p) v)))))))

(fn [n](let[m (reverse(sort-by key {1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 400 "CD" 100 "C"90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I"}))](loop[n n cs[]](let[[[x c] & _](drop-while #(< n(key %))m)](if x(recur(- n x)(conj cs c))(apply str cs))))))

(fn to-roman-numerals
  [n]
  (loop [res "" val n]
    (cond
      (>= val 1000) (recur (str res "M") (- val 1000))
      (>= val 900) (recur (str res "CM") (- val 900))
      (>= val 800) (recur (str res "DCCC") (- val 800))
      (>= val 700) (recur (str res "DCC") (- val 700))
      (>= val 600) (recur (str res "DC") (- val 600))
      (>= val 500) (recur (str res "D") (- val 500))
      (>= val 400) (recur (str res "CD") (- val 400))
      (>= val 300) (recur (str res "CCC") (- val 300))
      (>= val 200) (recur (str res "CC") (- val 200))
      (>= val 100) (recur (str res "C") (- val 100))
      (>= val 90) (recur (str res "XC") (- val 90))
      (>= val 80) (recur (str res "LXXX") (- val 80))
      (>= val 70) (recur (str res "LXX") (- val 70))
      (>= val 60) (recur (str res "LX") (- val 60))
      (>= val 50) (recur (str res "L") (- val 50))
      (>= val 40) (recur (str res "XL") (- val 40))
      (>= val 30) (recur (str res "XXX") (- val 30))
      (>= val 20) (recur (str res "XX") (- val 20))
      (>= val 10) (recur (str res "X") (- val 10))
      (>= val 9) (recur (str res "IX") (- val 9))
      (>= val 8) (recur (str res "VIII") (- val 8))
      (>= val 7) (recur (str res "VII") (- val 7))
      (>= val 6) (recur (str res "VI") (- val 6))
      (>= val 5) (recur (str res "V") (- val 5))
      (>= val 4) (recur (str res "IV") (- val 4))
      (>= val 3) (recur (str res "III") (- val 3))
      (>= val 2) (recur (str res "II") (- val 2))
      (>= val 1) (recur (str res "I") (- val 1))
      :else res
      )
    )
  )

(fn [x]
  (let [digits (map #(- (int %) (int \0)) (reverse (str x)))  
        dcc (fn dc [[s1 s2 s3] x] 
              (let [r (mod x 5) b (quot (inc x) 5)]   
               	(str  
                  (if (= r 4) s1)          
                  (["" s2 s3] b)
                  (if (< r 4) (apply str (repeat r s1))))))
        simbols [\I \V \X \L \C \D \M "" ""]]
    (apply str (reverse (map #(dcc (take 3 (drop %2 simbols)) %) 
      digits (range 0 7 2))))    
  )    
)

(fn write-roman [integer]
   (let [numbers [1000 500 100 50 10 5 1]
         translation {1000 \M
                      500  \D
                      100  \C
                      50   \L
                      10   \X
                      5    \V
                      1    \I}
         subtractive {"VIIII" "IX"
                      "IIII"  "IV"
                      "LXXXX" "XC"
                      "XXXX"  "XL"
                      "DCCCC" "CM"
                      "CCCC"  "CD"}]
     (loop [string []
            number integer]
       (if (= 0 number)
         (clojure.string/replace
           (apply str string)
           #"V?IIII|L?XXXX|D?CCCC"
           #(subtractive %))
         (let [maximal (first (drop-while #(> % number) numbers))
               its-char (translation maximal)]
           (recur (conj string its-char)
                  (- number maximal)))))))

(fn roo [num] 
        (:str
         (reduce (fn [acc [n char]] 
                     (let [quot (int (/ (:remain acc) n))]
                          {:remain (- (:remain acc) (* quot n))
                          :str (apply str (:str acc) (repeat quot char))}))
                 {:str "" :remain num} 
                 (partition 2 '(1000 "M" 900 "CM" 500 "D" 
                   400 "CD" 100 "C" 90 "XC" 50 "L" 40 "XL" 
                   10 "X" 9 "IX" 5 "V" 4 "IV" 1 "I")))))

(fn cntr [x]
  (apply str 
     (let [[mq mr] [(quot x 1000) (rem x 1000)]
           [dq dr] [(quot mr 500) (rem mr 500)]
           [cq cr] [(quot dr 100) (rem dr 100)]
           [lq lr] [(quot cr 50) (rem cr 50)]
           [xq xr] [(quot lr 10) (rem lr 10)]
           [vq vr] [(quot xr 5) (rem xr 5)]]
       (cond
         (> mq 0) (cons \M (cntr (- x 1000)))
         (and (= dq 1) (= cq 4)) (cons \C (cons \M (cntr (- x 900))))         
         (> dq 0) (cons \D (cntr (- x 500)))
         (= cq 4) (cons \C (cons \D (cntr (- x 400))))
         (> cq 0) (cons \C (cntr (- x 100)))
         (and (= lq 1) (= xq 4)) (cons \X (cons \C (cntr (- x 90))))         
         (> lq 0) (cons \L (cntr (- x 50)))
         (= xq 4) (cons \X (cons \L (cntr (- x 40))))
         (> xq 0) (cons \X (cntr (- x 10)))
         (and (= vq 1) (= vr 4)) "IX"
         (> vq 0) (cons \V (cntr (- x 5)))
         (= vr 4) "IV"
         (= vr 3) "III"
         (= vr 2) "II"
         (= vr 1) "I"))))

(fn fin-rom [x]
  {:pre [(<= x 3999)]}
  (letfn [(roms [x]
                ({1 \I 5 \V 10 \X 50 \L 100 \C 500 \D 1000 \M} x))
          (topars [x]
                  (reverse (map vector (reverse (into [] (map (comp read-string str) (seq (str x)))))  (iterate #(* % 10) 1))))
          (translate [v]
                     (let [f (first v)]
                       (cond
                         (<= f 3) (reduce str  (repeat f (roms (second v))))
                         (= f 4)  (str (translate [1 (second v)]) (translate [(inc f) (second v)]))
                         (= f 5) (str  (roms (* (first v) (second v))))
                         (<= f 8) (str (translate [5 (second v)]) (translate [(- f 5) (second v)]))
                         (= f 9) (str (translate [1 (second v)]) (translate [1 (* 10 (second v))])))))]
           (str (reduce str (map translate (topars x))))))

(fn [v]
  (let [th (quot v 1000)
        hu (quot (mod v 1000) 100)
        te (quot (mod v 100) 10)
        on (mod v 10)
        ths (apply str (repeat th "M"))
        hus ({9 "CM", 8 "DCCC", 7 "DCC", 6 "DC", 5 "C", 4 "CD", 3 "CCC", 2 "CC", 1 "C"} hu "")
        tes ({9 "XC", 8 "LXXX", 7 "LXX", 6 "LX", 5 "L", 4 "XL", 3 "XXX", 2 "XX", 1 "X"} te "")
        ons ({9 "IX", 8 "VIII", 7 "VII", 6 "VI", 5 "V", 4 "IV", 3 "III", 2 "II", 1 "I"} on "")]
    (str ths hus tes ons)))

(fn [n] (let [m [[1000 "M"] [900 "CM"] [500 "D"] [400 "CD"] [100 "C"] [90 "XC"] [50 "L"] [40 "XL"] [10 "X"] [9 "IX"] [5 "V"] [4 "IV"] [1 "I"]]] (apply str (reduce concat (second (reduce #(if (< (first %1) (first %2)) [(first %1) (second %1)] [(rem (first %1) (first %2)) (concat (second %1) (repeat (quot (first %1) (first %2)) (second %2)))]) [n ""] m))))))

(fn [d] (let [roman [ '[0 I II III IV V VI VII VIII IX]
                       '[0 X XX XXX XL L LX LXX LXXX XC]
                       '[0 C CC CCC CD D DC DCC DCCC CM]
                       '[0 M MM MMM MMMM MMMMM] ] ]
         (->> (loop [d d r []] (if (>= 0 d) r (recur (long (/ d 10)) (conj r (mod d 10)) ) ))
              (map (fn [r i] (nth r i)) roman) (filter #(not= '0 %)) reverse (reduce str "")
           )
))

(fn [n]
  (letfn [(r-digit [d t f i]
            (case d
              0 nil
              1 i
              2 [i i]
              3 [i i i]
              4 [i f]
              5 f
              6 [f i]
              7 [f i i]
              8 [f i i i]
              9 [i t]))]
    (let [cs [[\X \V \I] [\C \L \X] [\M \D \C]]]
      (->> n str
           (map #(- (int %) 48))
           (map-indexed #(let [p (- (count (str n)) % 1)]
                           (if (< p 3)
                             (apply r-digit %2 (cs p))
                             (repeat %2 \M))))
           flatten
           (apply str)))))

(fn roman [n]
  (let [roman-map (sorted-map 1 "I",
                              4 "IV"
                              5 "V",
                              9 "IX",
                              10 "X",
                              40 "XL",
                              50 "L",
                              90 "XC",
                              100 "C",
                              400 "CD",
                              500 "D",
                              900 "CM",
                              1000 "M")
        next-value (fn [n] (ffirst (rsubseq roman-map
                                            <=
                                            n)))
        next-chunk (fn [n] (roman-map (next-value n)))]
    (loop [result ""
           curr n]
      (if (zero? curr)
        result
        (recur (str result (next-chunk curr))
               (- curr (next-value curr)))))))

(fn [n]
  (let [nums {1 "I" 4 "IV" 5 "V" 9 "IX" 10 "X"
            40 "XL" 50 "L" 90 "XC" 100 "C"
            400 "CD" 500 "D" 900 "CM" 1000 "M"}]
    (loop [acc []
           x n]
      (if (= 0 x)
        (clojure.string/join "" acc)
        (let [next-num (apply max (filter #(<= % x) (keys nums)))]
          (recur (conj acc (nums next-num)) (- x next-num)))))))

(fn write-roman [n]
  (let [split-digits 
          (fn [n] (map #(Integer/parseInt (str %)) (str n)))
        digits (into [] (reverse (split-digits n)))
        process-place
          (fn [n one-sym five-sym ten-sym]
            (cond
              (= n nil) ""
              (<= n 3) (apply str (take n (repeat one-sym)))
              (= n 4) (str one-sym five-sym)
              (< n 9) (apply str five-sym (take (- n 5) (repeat one-sym)))
              (= n 9) (str one-sym ten-sym)))]
    (str (process-place (get digits 3) "M" "M" "M")
         (process-place (get digits 2) "C" "D" "M")
         (process-place (get digits 1) "X" "L" "C")
         (process-place (get digits 0) "I" "V" "X"))))

(fn [num]
  (let [svm (into (sorted-map-by >) {1000 "M", 500 "D", 350 "LC", 100 "C", 50 "L", 40 "XL", 10 "X", 5 "V", 4 "IV", 1 "I", 9 "IX", 900 "CM", 90 "XC"})]
    (letfn [(rn [r o]
              (if (= r 0)
                o
                (let [d (first (filter #(<= (first %) r) svm))]
                  (rn (- r (first d)) (str o (second d))))))]
      (rn num ""))))
